Standing in her way are other competitors and their familiars, including her own older sister and heiress to the mighty Dragon Clan, Celestia Lindwurm.

name: eXceed 2nd: Vampire REX
summary:
The human powers-that-be called for the purification of mankind and the eradication of vampires and ‘deviants bloodlines’ – those born of a mix of human and vampire. And so began massive purges of the deviants that were reminiscent of the “witch hunts” of centuries earlier. Leading the genocide was the exorcist corps the “Gun Bullet Children”.

As the overwhelmingly large human armies began to obliterate every vampire and deviant community across the world, the opposing deviant armies sought to gather allies and rally back. Lia Fyle is a half-human, half-vampire girl fighting on the side of the deviants as they embark upon a turnaround strategy, the “Siege on the Holy Land’. Their plan: to lay siege upon the humans’ “Holy Land” and to destroy the Holy Lady Anhel who was the source of the human military power. This is a battle in which defeat is an option for neither army.

Featuring an addictive dual-polarity gameplay system, this amazing vertical shmup is sure to please any shooter fan. The polarity and color of your character can be changed to absorb enemy bullets of the same polarity while charging the special weapon in the process and doing double damage to enemies of the opposite polarity. Every bullet absorbed charges your special weapon for total destruction. With awesome music, beautiful art, and challenging stages, this is the game that put the eXceed series on the map and has everything you would want from a shmup.

name: Explorer of Yggdrasil
summary: After rescuing an armless mage during a chance encounter, the explorer Mei embarks on a journey to reach the top of Yggdrasil, and to uncover the mystery of her forgotten past.

name: Exist Archive: The Other Side of the Sky
summary: The game is set within modern day Tokyo, Japan, alongside a world on another planet, called “Protolexa.” There are a dozen young protagonists, all of whom are evil, soul-collecting gods who have become embroiled in the issues of all gods. The main focus of the game is dungeon crawling. You’ll be able to explore dungeons from a side-view perspective, while the characters are presented in a 3D, chibi-sized style. The characters can use various skills like jumping, dashing, and more to solve puzzles. The enemies are not randomized, they are presented on screen prior to battle.

name: Exiting the White Room
summary:
An owl, a goat, and a wolf live in a white room. They’ve been stuck there for a long, long time. One day, the owl wakes up with a fleeting recollection of the day prior. You, the owl, tries to recall what happened.

A short mystery game where you try to uncover what happened to you and your surroundings the day prior.

name: Exiled
summary: Charlotte is missing. Decode an ancient language, investigate a mystery, and stay away from ancient monsters in this compact puzzle thriller.

name: Exit Zone
summary: Exit Zone is a multiplayer horror game with anomalies for 1–5 players, memorize every corridor, uncover anomalies, and make the right decisions—before Exit Zone traps you forever.

name: Excitebike: Bun-bun Mario Battle - Stadium 2
summary:
The second episode (stadium) of Excitebike: Bun-bun Mario Battle.

Excitebike: Bun Bun Mario Battle is a remake/adaptation of the NES title, Excitebike. In this game, all human motorcyclists were replaced with Mario characters. As a Satellaview title, Nintendo developed the video game and released four versions of it through the satellite download service operated by St.GIGA, each expanding on or replacing the features of the last.
Audio broadcasting of the game is both advice on the game and voice drama told by characters. Voice actors are the same as that of "BS Super Mario USA", but Excitebike adds a new character, Wario (Chikao Ootsuka).

name: Expense
summary: Balance chance and strategy to escape a procedurally generated maze of unique AI opponents in this first-person adventure/escape room blend. Follow your pendulum and try not to lose money; you're going to need it.

name: Exodus Guilty Alternative
summary: An adult version of Exodus Guilty for the PC.

name: Excitebike: World Rally
summary:
The classic game play of Excitebike is combined with new controls and features in this exclusive WiiWare title!

Prepare to face daredevil jumps, crazy obstacles, and other racers in the newest member of the venerable Excitebike franchise, exclusively available on the WiiWare service. Choose from multiple camera angles as you tilt your way to smooth landings using the motion-sensitive controls and compete in races around the world in four championship circuits. Better yet, use Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection to invite friends to a race, or if you’re feeling brave, take on anyone else looking for a match. Feel like tackling a challenge of your own design? Use the intuitive Track Editor to choose from the available obstacles and put together your dream course, then share your masterpiece with friends (and vice versa) to see whose creation skills reign supreme. After all, you know what they say about riding a bike—once you’ve learned how, you never forget...

name: Exorcist
summary: The Exorcist is a first-person horror game. It can scare you with its dark atmosphere, which is realistic and frightening. Can you destroy the demon?

name: Extreme Car Driving Simulator
summary:
Ever wanted to try a sports car simulator? Now you can drive, drift and feel a racing sports car for free!
Be a furious racer on a whole city for you. No need to brake because of traffic or racing other rival vehicles, so you can perform illegal stunt actions and run full speed without the police chasing you!

Drifting fast and doing burnouts had never been so fun! Burn the asphalt of this open world city!

name: Explo Bee
summary:
Help the dizzy spinning bee fly from flower to flower pollinating as he goes!
Simply tap the screen to launch the bee and he will fly in a straight line (hopefully) landing on another flower. Go for Speed combos or play it safe, but make sure your aim is true or you will lose the bee.
Don't wait too much on a flower or you'll explode!!!
BuzzBee features an easy, pick up and play, one-touch control scheme. Suitable for any age, the game offers cute, colorful graphics and full-length musical scores.
There are ten rounds of gameplay which progressively increase in difficulty, local high score rankings and even a voice-over by a professional opera singer.

name: Excalibots
summary: Excalibots is a 3D isometric hack-n-slash game, in which you play as Percy, the sword obsessed knight. Fight off hordes of enemies in order to collect quirky, powerful swords and defend the kingdom!

name: Exit Strategy
summary: You and your skeleton crew have been eternally cursed to solve puzzles and go on dangerous adventures, will you accept this challenge? Choose your adventure and progress through intense gameplay!

name: Explorers Collection: The Oregon Trail & Carmen Sandiego Bundle
summary:
The Explorers Collection brings together two legendary educational games: The Oregon Trail and Carmen Sandiego, reimagining these iconic adventures for a new generation of players. This premium bundle offers an immersive journey through history, strategy, and global exploration.

• In The Oregon Trail, players navigate the challenging westward journey, making critical decisions that impact their party's survival. Facing obstacles like blizzards, broken limbs, and dysentery, players must strategically manage their resources and overcome numerous random events to reach Oregon before winter.

• Carmen Sandiego offers a thrilling global adventure where players team up with the world's greatest thief to track down the VILE syndicate. Using spy tools and exploring iconic global landmarks, players solve crimes while discovering geography, culture, and critical thinking through an engaging, story-driven gameplay experience.

name: Exhibit of Sorrows
summary:
Not all is well in the Exhibit of Sorrows. Move through this progressively creepy exhibition and check out the strange dolls on display. Interact with the dolls to reveal the keys. Be prepared to do terrible things to escape.

The mood gets darker and more unsettling as you progress. You will encounter the same exhibitions in disturbing new forms as you become increasingly more panicked to escape. You will have to make cruel decisions in order to leave.

Regardless of the sinister undertone to the game, there is a story to learn that will keep you gripped to the end. Exhibit of Sorrows is an excellent horror game worth seeing through.

name: Exclusive Memory
summary: Three Days of Crisis: Exclusive Memories "is a suspenseful love story full dynamic live action interactive video game. The whole game is a process of exploration and puzzle solving, in which you will delve into a complex and mysterious story. Collect clues through interactions with different characters, solve puzzles, and gradually uncover the truth hidden behind them

name: ExpandoScape
summary: Manipulate the size of the green gear blocks in order to make your way to seemingly unreachable goals in this unique puzzle-platformer.

name: Exit16: Byilhan Hotel
summary:
"Exit16: Byilhan Hotel" is a "walking simulator" & "Spot the Difference" game. The game challenges players to unravel hidden anomalies strewn across the enigmatic corridor of the Byilhan Hotel.

Each floor of the hotel presents a unique canvas, with some adorned by the peculiarities of anomalies while others maintain an eerie semblance of normalcy. Your task is to discern the subtle nuances that distinguish the ordinary from the extraordinary, as every object, every angle, and every shadow holds a potential clue.
Traverse the hallways with caution, for not all anomalies reveal themselves readily.

If you suspect there is an anomaly, turn back. If you believe everything is normal, that there are no anomalies, do not turn back and continue down the corridor. If you make a mistake, you will know by looking at the level number. If the number has increased, you have made the correct choice. If you return to level 1, you have made a mistake and will need to start over (the anomalies will be different). The goal is to reach the final level.

Navigate the twists and turns of the Byilhan Hotel, unraveling its mysteries one anomaly at a time.

name: Exit Together
summary: Exit Together is a 1-6 player co-op or single-player anomaly loop adventure game. Find anomalies, solve puzzles, and avoid traps. Set in a retro 1960s office atmosphere, observe your surroundings carefully to reach the next room. Will you reach Room 9 and exit, or remain trapped forever in the loop?

name: Exorcism Agency
summary: Welcome to Exorcism Agency. Exorcism Agency is an innovative game that blends match-3, Zuma, and paranormal adventures. By chance, you join a company that aims to eliminate ghosts. As stories are revealed, there seem to be deeper secrets hidden behind this supernatural world.

name: Exark
summary: Exark is an engine builder about building a city aboard a gigantic ark-ship. Construct buildings, staff them with crew members, and maximise your ark's resource production by exploiting powerful synergies. Lead your Great House to safety at the rim of the world.

name: Expeditions: Rome - Death or Glory
summary: Don the armour of a Gladiator and enter the arena to win fame and fortune in ‘Death or Glory!’ Play with the new Gladiator character class as you tackle 3 new arenas either during the campaign or in the brand-new Gladiator mode.

name: Exoterra: A Space Journey
summary: EXOTERRA: A Space Journey is a first-person science fiction puzzle game set aboard a stranded ship in the vast, dark expanse of outer space. Explore the HOPE-03 and uncover the mysteries it holds as you solve fully interactive escape-room-style chambers powered by a physics-based system.

name: Exit: The Curse of Ophir
summary: Prove yourself in a brand new digital adventure: The award-winning game series Exit: The Game now as an app. Escape the curse: Exciting escape room game with an all-new storyline. Conquer the challenge alone: For a single player. The adventure awaits you: Exciting mystery puzzle adventure with multi-layered, creative puzzles. Think beyond the app: Anything can be part of the game! Immerse yourself in the mysterious setting: atmospheric soundtrack, voiced texts and hand-drawn background graphics create a suspenseful atmosphere. Are you ready?

name: Exo Exit
summary:
Exo Exit is a sci-fi action, adventure and exploration game based on the surface of Mars.

Strategic thinking as well as quick reactions are required to negotiate the red planet’s inhospitable environment and to set up and develop a base there. 

Beautiful, expansive landscapes have been designed for exploration, and forgotten relics of past inhabitations – crucial for progress – are rendered in awesome detail.

The game is in production for PC and Mac, and plans for a Virtual Reality support are already being made.

name: Executive Assault
summary: Executive Assault is an indie real-time strategy/first-person shooter computer game where you can not only build your base and create armies, but also take control of your units and fight as one of them.

name: Experiment
summary: You don't know where you are but you know you need to get out. Figuring how, managing your resources, solving puzzles and fighting/avoiding enemies.

name: Excessive Speed
summary: Isometric racing game with power-ups.

name: Exoblast
summary: Exoblast is a shoot'em up arcade game, pimped with synthwave music and pixel art. Choose your pilot, your ship and join the arena to confront other players in nervous and punitive matches. Impose your gameplay and reach the top of the tower!

name: Exophobia
summary: Explore and fight your way through a crashed human spaceship infested with relentless hordes of aliens as you become more powerful with exciting weapon upgrades and powerups in this retro inspired first-person shooter.

name: Exsynchronos
summary: Exsynchronos is a first-person exploration game with platforming and shooter elements. It has a distinct style that employs extreme audiovisual overload to portray its self-described "cyberspace metahorror" atmosphere.

name: Extraordinary Ball
summary: Dive into an unforgettable adventure with an ordinary office clerk who suddenly finds himself trapped in a magical world!

name: Exovoid Carnage
summary: Exovoid Carnage is an intense wave-based arena shooter that cranks up the chaos to eleven. Shoot! Shred! Survive!

name: Exile's End
summary:
"Japan's take on classic Commodore 64/Amiga action-adventure games. NOT a Metroidvania. Use your wits and your weapons to discover an ancient secret and gain your redemption. Art and music by Japanese legends of console gaming.

Exile's End is an homage to early 90's action-adventure PC games like Flashback and Another World, but with a Japanese flair. The core of the game is from Australian game maker Magnetic Realms with art, cutscenes, and music provided by legends of the 8 and 16-bit eras from Japan. It draws its thematic influence from the science-fiction films and anime of the 80's and its gameplay from classic Amiga and Commodore 64 action-adventures.

- Music From Keiji Yamagishi (Ninja Gaiden NES, Tecmo Bowl, Captain Tsubasa)
- Art by staff from Secret of Mana,First Kiss Story, Mother 3, and more!
- NES-style cutscenes by OPUS (Half-Minute Hero)"

name: Excite Bowling
summary: "Excite Bowling" is an experience game released by Epoch in 2002. It was released as one of the "experimental games" (Taikan game) series. It is a hardware-integrated plug-and-play game that uses XaviX technology. Later, "XaviX Bowling", which can be said to be the successor software, was released on "XaviXPORT", a hardware dedicated to XaviX technology.

name: Exploding Judo Federation
summary: It's judo on a minefield! Tech the grab or die, in this fast-paced 3D fighting game where every! single! throw! is lethal!

name: Exit 2: Directions
summary: The marvelous marbles are rolling again! This wonderful puzzle game offers countless fun hours of game play. It includes 60 carefully designed high quality levels. Solid game play, polished visuals, relaxing music tracks, best in class puzzle experience. Start your journey today!

name: Extreme Drifters
summary: The greatest drifting tournament starts! It is a dangerous race for the highly qualified racers. And that's your chance to show who is the best drifter. Compete with the mightiest rivals on the racing tracks of 2 cities, complete tasks and win!

name: Exit From
summary: You wake up from the noise of thunderstorms, no one there. You are trying to get out and realize that after all you are not alone here... Сan You Exit From?

name: Extreme Assault
summary:
Set in a futuristic theater of war, Extreme Assault guides the player through six totally different operation zones, each sub-divided into multiple missions requiring the completion of a variety of exciting tasks. Objectives range from destroying all the enemy units in a given area, to rescuing hostages, defending towns, pulverizing hidden bases, and even engaging alien forces! 
 
At times you'll also find yourself in restricted quarters and have to transfer from your lethal Sioux AH-23 attack helicopter to the awesome T-1 battle tank. Each vehicle is heavily armed with a vast array of weapons ranging from Laser Guns and Guided Missiles, to enormously powerful Smart Bombs and Thunderbolts. And I haven't even mentioned the graphics!

name: Exciting Billiard
summary: Exciting Billiard is a Sports game, developed and published by Konami, which was released in Japan in 1987.

name: Exodus Guilty Neos
summary: A fully voiced port of the PlayStation game, Exodus Guilty.

name: eXoSpace Combat Engineer
summary: Design your ship, choose your target, and embark on a hunt through a randomly generated universe. Each hyperjump leads to a new and unexpected encounter, forcing you to make tough choices. What kind of bounty hunter will you become?

name: Executioner
summary: The Executioner is a 1-4 player online coop shooting survival game. There are a large number of extremely heinous criminals waiting to be executed in the overcrowded prison. In order to survive, they will rush towards you and try to kill you. If you don't kill them, you will be the one killed.

name: Exiled Kingdoms
summary: Roam freely through a huge open world full with dangers, ancient secrets and adventure. An old-school action-RPG with a challenging environment, tough choices and a unique setting. Explore, fight, make friends and enemies... and above all, Roleplay!

name: Exojet +
summary:
Exojet + is shooter game released in 1983 on the Magnavox Odyssey.
Released in Europe

name: Exo Mayhem
summary: Exo Mayhem is the ultimate supervillain experience! Fly, Shoot, Stab, Explode, and Traverse Paradise Mall, a lush multi-biome open world ripe for conquering!

name: Excitebike
summary: Excitebike is a motocross racing video game franchise made by Nintendo. It first debuted as a game for the Famicom in Japan in 1984 and as a launch title for the NES in 1985. It is the first game of the Excite series.

name: Extreme Car Stunts Classic: Demolition Wreckfast
Exiles
summary: Exiles is a fast-paced multiplayer shooter set in a futuristic world where constant PvP battles shape survival. Play as an exiled council member and wield powerful energy weapons in combat as you fight to defend a desolate planet. With smooth gameplay and striking visuals across devices, every match challenges your skill and reflexes as you compete to prove yourself against rival players.

name: Exoborne
summary: Exoborne is an open-world, tactical extraction shooter set in a world torn apart by extreme forces of nature. Customize powerful exo-rigs to gain strategic advantage in ever-changing weather conditions. Face hostile factions, enemy players, and Mother Nature herself in intense high-stakes sessions.

name: Exer Gale
summary: Exer Gale is a virtual reality arcade game for those who wish to fly and get away. The game gives you the freedom to glide, dive and climb in charming tropical environments using your body.

name: Exit 13 Gallery Escape
summary: Exit 13 Gallery Escape is a psychological horror game where you are trapped in a gallery on the 13th floor of a building. Your only hope is to find the exit and reach the 1st floor, but every time you do, you end up in the same gallery again and again.

name: Executioner Girls
summary: Executioner Girls is a difficult turn-based RPG. Skilled adventurers and criminals hid in secret graveyard. You have to be "Chara", the executioner girl, and explore this place and complete the only mission given.

name: Extermination
summary: A survival horror game for the PlayStation 2.

name: Explore Fushimi Inari
summary: Experience a detailed, realistically designed recreation of the renowned Japanese shrine, Fushimi Inari Taisha. Explore the expansive Kyoto mountainside in first person, take photos with the in-game camera, immerse yourself in an atmosphere reminiscent of the real place.

name: Expelled!
summary: A School Prefect has been pushed out of a window, and everyone's blaming YOU. Can you find the culprit - or someone to take the fall - before you get EXPELLED? Mystery with a wicked twist, from the creators of Overboard! and A Highland Song.

name: Extreme Car Drift Simulator
summary: If you want to drift wildly, this game is for you. With the drift game, you can have a great car driving simulation experience.

name: Exodus from the Earth
summary:
The Intelligence Agency has commissioned you, Francis Rixon, to find out what is happening inside the Corporation's confines and to retrieve information about a secret mineral upon which the very existence of the human race may depend.

Explore and battle through various locations on two planets, each with multiple objectives.

name: Exitium
summary: Exitium is a horror story game that lasts 3-4 hours. Right after being broken up with, you died. You open your eyes in a creepy black and white place, chased by monsters. You have to find out what happened to you by finding pieces of your memory and choosing between forgiveness or revenge.

name: Explottens: The time is meow!
summary: Explottens is a heart pumping, hair raising, pawtastic shoot ‘em up that follows K.I.T the pilot and his band of misfits as they zip, boost, and shoot through the sky, battling the ferocious felines known as K.L.A.W! Dominate the skies and battle your way through an army of evil cats just waiting to turn you into their purrrsonal scratching post. Unlock weapons, aircrafts, and spectacular sidekicks as you explode your way through this catacular adventure because with Explottens; the sky’s the limit!

name: Exoprimal: Barrage - Volcano
summary: Contents: Volcano exosuit skin for Barrage

name: Extreme Custom Night
summary: You have finished your job of a night-guard last week, and now you have nightmares of your own. The memories are still awake in your head, and to stop the terror, you must survive against all of them!

name: Ex Natura: Nature Corrupted
summary: Ex Natura: Nature Corrupted is a challenging, action packed, souls lite experience developed by Blackburne Game Studio. Fight your way from the deepest cultist dungeos to the top of the holy tree and reclaim your throne in this mysterious "pre-human" era themed epic story.

name: ExoSphere
summary: The earth as we know it can no longer sustain our numbers and the natural resources are all used up. In an attempt at finding a new home for humanity privately financed space programs were formed to send volunteers into the unknown in search of suitable planets to colonize. You are the commanding officer for the Exosphere-operation and it is your job to lay the foundation for the new Earth. Will humanity thrive or fall under its own weight? It's all up to you.

name: Excremental Game
summary: A chaotic incremental Poop-Shooter where bouncing poop earns points! Level up your poop, and unleash explosive, multi-poop madness!

name: Extreme Sports with the Berenstain Bears
summary: Get extreme with Mama, Papa, Brother, and Sister Bear in their first Game Boy Color game, EXTREME SPORTS WITH THE BERENSTAIN BEARS! In this single-player game you'll control the members of the family as they participate in an assortment of extreme sports events. Use Brother or Sister Bear in kayaking, dirt boarding, biking, and luge, or take the whole family in the river rafting and toboggan sequences. All of the events take place from an overhead perspective, which provides the best view of the playing field. In each event you can perform a wild range of tricks and stunts to gain speed and shave seconds off the clock. Can you beat the high scores and become the best bear you can be? Well-animated characters set on colorful, detailed backgrounds ensure a bright presentation.

name: Expedition: Into Darkness
summary: Expedition: Into Darkness is a medieval third-person cooperative dungeon crawler and extraction looter. Assemble weapons, customize gear, and join forces with up to four other allies. Survive the ruins—or lose everything you carr

name: Exodemic
summary: Destroy aliens, dash between planets, and buy powerful upgrades. Exodemic is a compact roguelike that combines frenetic shoot 'em up gameplay with a procedurally generated overworld filled with vendors, trading hubs, and combat encounters. Race against the clock to save the human race.

name: Extreme Escape
summary: Extreme Escape is an escape-room puzzle game with an action component. It combines realistic graphics with challenges at high altitudes. The player must find his way out of a critical situation by facing difficult weather conditions, technical problems and the fear of heights.

name: Exorcist: Reviewer of Minds
summary: Everyone must resist the relentless unfairness with the cards they've been dealt. Use the randomly distributed holy verses to identify the names of the 10 demons. Save 5 people and exorcise the sixth threat lurking in the shadows. This is a compact game of continuous gambles and judgments.

name: Expeditions: Conquistador
summary:
Conquer the New world: In the 16th Century, Spanish explorers and soldiers reached the shores of America. The search for gold, fame, and adventure drove these travelers into a treacherous wilderness where they faced hunger, disease, and dangerous predators. In their wake, the Aztec Empires lay in ruins.

Re-write the history of the Conquistadors: Forge diplomatic alliances with the natives... or crush the savages and bring civilization to the pagan tribes! Create an expedition of individual characters: Choose your followers wisely from over 30 characters, but be careful - they each have their own traits, opinions and moral standards.

Hunt for unimaginable riches and fight intense battles in the unforgiving jungle. In this turn based strategy RPG, a cunning plan is as vital as thoughtful resource management. Expeditions: Conquistador offers a rich storyline separated into two campaigns, challenging players throughout 25+ hours of gameplay. Strategy veterans as well as newbies will find their turn-based El Dorado!Features
Discover the New World! Travel to legendary locations in America, roam the jungle on the hunt for mystical temples as well as ancient ruins.
Create your own party of followers! Choose from more than 30 characters, train your recruits and lead them to battle. Coach them as they will develop from untrained recruits to fierce battlefield veterans.
Four highly customisable difficulty levels will challenge pros and newbies alike. But be warned: The Iron Man mode is a real beast!
Choice & Consequence: Use your skills to avoid hostility or, when diplomacy breaks down, adapt your tactics to highly varied terrains across more than 70 battlefields.
Challenge your friends to tactical PvP combat in either Hot Seat mode or via TCP/ICP.

name: Exodus of Descent
summary: Descend into an online third person PvE RPG dungeon looter inspired by RuneScape and Dark and Darker. Party up with your friends to solve escape-room type puzzles, collect over 150+ lootable items, level up your character, create unique classes and unlock new abilities. Escape Your Descent!

name: Exorcised
summary: Become an Exorcist! Defend your city from evil demons by using cute towers designed as shrine maidens. Fight hordes of demons using powerful Alliances and strategize your way towards victory. Upgrade your defense after each map until you'll be able to face the root of all evil!

name: Extortion
summary: You're a computer engineer with a terrible secret. Someone is blackmailing you and now, you have to hack some servers and get secret files for him. Would you succeed to achieve his missions or would you find him and revenge ?

name: Exverse
summary: Dive into 2085 with Exverse, a gripping FPS that merges intense shooter gameplay with innovative Web3 mechanics built on Unreal Engine 5. Humanity clings to survival in space after a cataclysmic event rendered Earth a wasteland. As the planet's flora unleashed a deadly toxin, the race to save or abandon Earth divides humanity.

name: Expedition to the Backrooms
summary: You are the exploration team from company Async, you arrive to reported anomaly place and searching for anomalies, but what would you find? Prepare yourself for a gripping and heart-pounding adventure in EXPEDITION TO THE BACKROOMS, where every step could be your last.

name: Ex-Zodiac
summary: A fast-paced low-poly 3D rail shooter heavily inspired by classics of the early 90's. Join protagonist Kyuu as she fights to free the worlds of the Sanzaru Star System, overrun by the intergalactic terrorist organization known as Zodiac.

name: Ex Astris
summary: Ex Astris reveals an exploration of episodic narrative and 3D RPG gameplay.

name: Expedition Chronicles
summary: Embark on an adventurous quest through jungles, deserts, and oceans to uncover the lost city of Atlantis. Solve puzzles and unlock ancient secrets!

name: Exelio
summary: In "Exelio," you'll face an ever-changing environment and various threats while acquiring the knowledge and skills needed to survive in uncharted lands. Explore a world where beautiful nature and harsh realities collide, and delve into its mysteries as you carve out your own fate.

name: Exes Assault!!
summary: A BL Bara Romantic Comedy Visual Novel

name: Exterminatus: A Grim Odyssey
summary: A futuristic game, with lots of beatings, in the best Pancadaria style! Punch down several enemies in an underground atmosphere through cyberpunk places! Use kicking, punching, grabbing techniques or even weapons, such as daggers, nunchucks, whips, grenades, pistols, etc.

name: Extraction Valley
summary: Create two teams of 8v8 with your friends and defeat devils as well as your friends in Extraction Valley Devils' Curse™ and enjoy the multiplayer shooter experience in different maps.

name: Exocomets
summary: Exocomets is a basic yet difficult action game where you try to survive as long as possible against incoming waves of comets. One hit, and your ship is dead. Survive for as long as possible by collecting powerups and stars to beat every level!

name: Extinct Forest
summary: Fight for your life in a mysterious, abandoned open world. In Extinct Forest, there are no crosshairs and no HUD — just you and your weapon against intelligent dinosaurs. Explore the desolate wilderness, solve environmental puzzles, and master realistic combat mechanics in this immersive shooter.

name: Experiment: One
summary: Psychological horror in which you will have to try on the role of a psychologist on a helpline, as well as be drawn into a series of strange events taking place in the office.

name: Exilium
summary: Exilium is an atmospheric point & click project. As an exorcist, you will face demons and occult rituals. Cast out evil spirits with your skills and improvised means. Uncover dark secrets and restore balance before it's too late...

name: Exocars
summary: Immerse yourself in the adrenaline-pumping world of VR racing! Strap into EXOcars and compete against real players in asynchronous multiplayer mode. Show off your skills as the ultimate VR racer!

name: Exorcise Demons
summary:
Trapped in a mysterious place, you must perform rituals to defeat powerful demons.
The Book of Rituals is your only way of knowing how to achieve them.

But there is a catch: only one player can see the screen, and the other is the only one who can read the book! In this game, communication is essential, never stop sharing information!

Discover through the story a new type of game based on your ability to communicate. Exorcise The Demons is a unique experience and an immersive game that will test your friendship!

name: Extremely Realistic Siege Warfare Simulator
summary: Extremely Realistic Siege Warfare Simulator is a physics-based tactics RPG game which you leading your own force in fantasy medieval world. Build your army and siege equipments. Experience epic siege battles. Lead your people revolting the tyrant!

name: Exploration Escape Room Bundle
summary: Four escape room games included! Mystic Academy: Escape Room, Pyramids and Aliens: Escape Room, Secrets of Blackrock Manor - Escape Room, Between Time: Escape Room.

name: Exapunks
summary: The year is 1997. You used to be a hacker, but now you have the phage. You made a deal: one hack, one dose. There’s nothing left to lose… except your life.

name: Exista!
summary: EXISTA! offers a journey of a child through intriguing challenges and obstacles. In the role of the child, you must overcome obstacles using your natural abilities. As you progress, new skills are acquired, enabling you to face increasingly complex challenges.

name: Extinction
summary:
As far back as anyone can remember, humanity has been at war with itself. For generations, kingdoms have fought amongst themselves while the real threat loomed in the distance. Legend calls them the Ravenii, encroaching armies of bloodthirsty monsters standing 150 feet tall that once threatened to destroy humankind. Now the threat has returned, and only those trained in the ways of the ancient order stand a chance at defeating the ogres. You are one of the world’s last Sentinels, a soldier named Avil equipped with the skills to battle the endless wave of Ravenii.

Fight massive brutes and their minions across a sprawling countryside, defending cities and rescuing refugees torn from their homes. Swiftly define your strategy as hordes attack from the ground and air. Use the dynamic skill-based combat system to your advantage, tactically disarming and dismembering enemies to go in for the kill. This is no longer a war. It is an annihilation. And you are all that stands between humanity…and extinction.

name: Exile
summary: Exile is a single-player action-adventure video game originally published for the Acorn Electron and BBC Micro in 1988 by Superior Software and later ported to the Commodore 64, Amiga, CD32 and Atari ST, all published by Audiogenic. Exile's game physics engine qualifies it to be the first game to have a complete Newtonian motion model. At the time of its release it was considered to push the boundaries of what was possible on home computers, particularly on the 8-bit platforms. It remains probably the most complex game available for the BBC Micro. The game was designed and programmed by Peter Irvin (author of Starship Command, a space shoot-em-up with an innovative control system) and Jeremy Smith (author of Thrust, a game based on cave exploration with a simpler physics model).

name: Exerion
summary: The Famicom port of Exerion is a shoot 'em up game featuring parallax effects and inertia simulation, something notable for 1983. The player travels around strange scenarios shooting aliens. The player has two types of guns: fast single shot (limited) or slow double shot (unlimited).

name: Exoprimal
summary:
Exoprimal is a co-op action game with a competitive edge.
Two teams of five players in powered armor battle hordes of dinosaurs. Only one team will survive.

name: Exoplanet: First Contact
summary: Exoplanet: First Contact is a single-player, story driven action-RPG set in a space western universe, where real and fictional technologies meet the cruel and unforgiving, yet romantic reality of the Wild West exploration and development. You are playing as Jack Sharp, a daring adventurer, stranded against his will on a dangerous, wild planet known as K'Tharsis. The former mining outpost where he’s taken up residence is now gradually becoming a “ghost colony” as the Antigravium Crystal Rush is over and the inhabitants of this desert world struggle for survival.

name: Extreme Pinball
summary:
Extreme Pinball was Epic's successor to their hit pinball game Epic Pinball.

It contains four pinball tables: Rock Fantasy, Medieval Knights, Urban Chaos, and Monkey Mayhem, each with a different theme. Compared to Epic Pinball, it has a larger, 320x400 resolution, as well as taller tables, both allowing for more objects. It also has a typical Dot Matrix Display where the scoreboard shows 3D-rendered animations as well.

The controls are more sensitive with a faster ball. This is less true to real pinball gameplay, but it speeds up the game's pace and gives more power to the player to influence the movement.

name: Exertus
summary:
Exertus is a first-person action platformer with free-run and old school FPS inspired movement mechanics. 
 
Through use of the fluid movement set within the game and the dynamic level elements, players have the simple aim of getting from point A to point B, either by using the beaten path or the off-path environment in the semi-linear levels. 
 
Compete against yourself and other players through global platform leaderboards and statistics, or relax and play for fun.

name: ExtraGalactica
summary: A college football captain's fight to defend his rival's home-world from the rogue villain in his Professor's favorite arcade game. Slow time using Retro-Dash as you pilot Super G Machine through waves of scaling enemy's, defeat huge bosses, and explore Celestro with Captain Flerp and his copycat Nova!

name: ExZeus: The Complete Collection
summary: Hostile alien forces have set their sights on Earth and will stop at nothing to wipe our civilization from existence. The invaders seek to use their advanced technology to annihilate humanity, but they weren’t expecting the people of Earth to counter with sophisticated technology of our own. Enter Project ExZeus, humanity’s last and best defense to repel the otherworldly menace and restore peace to our little blue planet using ultra high tech fighting robots! Take control of four different robots and blast those aliens back to where they came from in these action-focused high-flying 3D arcade style rail shooters! ExZeus In the year 2102 C.E. a massive, previously unknown asteroid entered Earth’s orbit and began unleashing waves of attacks on the planet, killing thousands of people every day and devastating human civilization. The lucky few who survived the initial onslaught managed to escape deep underground, narrowly preventing humanity’s extinction. The Governing Council ordered an immediate counter-attack using three experimental robots: Calista, Sophia, and Dynamis. With that, Operation ExZeus was born. Now, you must choose one of the three giant flying robots to take into battle against the invading forces of Diadora. Soar through the skies, blast away enemies, and reclaim Earth for its people! ExZeus 2 After a century of peace, Operation ExZeus and the defeat of Diadora are but a distant memory for the people of Earth. However, the peace was not to last. A new menace has emerged from deep space in the form of five mysterious pods, each one a weapon of mass…

name: Exit: The Game - Trial of the Griffin
summary: An exciting Escape Room experience awaits you! Can you uncover the secrets of Greifenstein Castle and escape?

name: Extreme Evolution: Drive to Divinity
summary: Extreme Evolution is an expressive platformer adventure; movement is your power: transform, drive, run, split, tumble, and launch yourself. Discover new forms and evolve as you explore this organic underworld open world.

name: Extraction Force
summary: Nuclear launch codes have been stolen! Invade the enemy base. Destroy everything in your path. Locate the stolen codes and return them safely to prevent the end of the world.

name: Exist
summary:
Have you ever invented your own worlds? Perhaps you managed to think out one of them so well that you literally immersed in it? Sometimes, when the soul is badly bad, you just want to take it and find yourself in a fantasy world where everything is fine, but there are no problems. But ... But suppose that in this world, you have terrible consequences for him, carrying a part of your problems into your own fragile world.
And now, now your world is bursting at the seams because of you, and you are simply stuck in it.

name: Explosive Dinosaurs
summary: EXPLOSIVE DINOSAURS is a competitive minigame collection up to 4 players, local multiplayer. The main objective of this game is to DESTROY FRIENDSHIPS!! (We won't be responsible if you end up having FUN)

name: Expeditions: A MudRunner Game
summary: Embark on scientific expeditions with this new off-road adventure from the creators of MudRunner and SnowRunner. Lead research missions as you drive a variety of all-terrain vehicles, using high-tech tools and managing your camp and crew to ensure your success in the wild.

name: Exodus: Trapped In Time
summary: A retro 2.5D sci-fi FPS shooter with modern mechanics with custom engine. Features completely destructible environments, bullet-time slow motion, Newtonian physics, dynamic lighting and more fun features.

name: Experiment 28
summary: Experiment 28 is a PSX-style survival horror game set in a research facility crawling with the undead. Inspired by classics like Resident Evil and Silent Hill, it features tense exploration, puzzle solving, relentless hordes of the undead and co-op for up to 4 players.

name: Exit Dream
summary: A free short first-person horror game of dream puzzles - unsettling, surreal, and hauntingly atmospheric.

name: Exit of Truth! 40 Masterpiece Quiz
summary: Uncover the truth hidden in famous masterpieces. 40 challenges that will put your sensitivity and observation skills to the test

name: Extreme Tactical Executioners
summary: Set in the near future, Earth is becoming uninhabitable. Human Beings send AI-driven robots to your planet, Impulse, to eliminate your species in preparation for their colonization of your planet. Blast your way through hordes of enemy bots to protect your home and prevent the human invasion!

name: Excommunication
summary: The renegade Angloids and wayward souls forge plans within the artificial realms, let them burn in the surreal 'hack and slash'. Excommunication is an artistic experience in which the heretics dream of uprising. But let steel be your answer. No heretic shall remain.

name: Exofinity Clicker
summary: Discover new worlds and earn credits by mining the legendary Infinity Crystal in Exofinity Clicker! Tap to extract rare cosmic minerals, upgrade your buildings and expand your reach as you evolve from a small outpost into a multi-planetary powerhouse.

name: Expeditions: Viking
summary: Expeditions: Viking is a Historically-themed RPG set in the Viking Age. As the new leader of a humble clan of farmers and fighters players must adventure into the unknown lands to the west to raid and/or trade their way to wealth, fame and glory. Will you rewrite history as a peaceful and benevolent trader? Or pave your road to Valhalla with the treasures and bones of your fallen enemies? Experience choice and consequence as never before in the much awaited addition to the Expeditions Series, Expeditions: Viking.

name: Exit the Gungeon
summary: Exit the Gungeon is a bullet hell dungeon climber immediately following the adventures of the misfit ‘Gungeoneers’ and their journey for personal absolution in Enter the Gungeon. The Gungeon has become a paradox and is collapsing! Armed with an ever-changing weapon, an insatiable need to loot, and the trusty dodge roll, each of our heroes must ascend and escape via their own unique route of increasingly perilous elevators. Battle against the last and most bitter of the Gundead at a frantic pace, slowing down just long enough to chat with some familiar faces… and a few new ones. Shifting rooms, enemies, bosses, bizarre weapons and items all combine to ensure that no two attempts to Exit the Gungeon are the same.

name: Exo One
summary: Exo One is a single-player, exoplanetary exploration game where you pilot an alien craft capable of manipulating gravity.

name: Expand & Exterminate: Terrytorial Disputes - Endless Base Defense
summary: The best elements of Real-Time Strategy (RTS) and Tower Defense genres combined into a new Base Defense game. Defend against countless waves of enemies while you expand your base, gather resources, and research technologies to defeat the ever strengthening enemy units.

name: Extreme Slasherman
summary: Slash the bad guys

name: Excuse Me
summary: Politely leave the room.

name: Extreme Skill
summary: An Xbox Live Indie game

name: Exist
summary: VT03 (16-bit graphics) port of Exist.

name: Ex-Fraktion
summary: Self-Cooperate in this SplitScreen-Inception-Shooter!

name: Extreme Jump
summary: Welcome to the adrenaline-fueled realm of the Extreme Jumping Simulator!

name: Extensor
summary: Set on the planet Spazm, Extensor places the player in a futuristic sports tournament where you compete against computer-controlled dromes in high-speed light cycle-style races. The game emphasizes reflexes and spatial awareness, with a first-person viewpoint and neon-like visuals reminiscent of Tron.

name: Expel
summary: You become a ghost and surprise, attack, and curse the ghost investigators who come to your house. You can scare them however you like, and later replay the game from the investigator's point of view to see what kind of ghost you were.

name: Examination of Fear
summary: Thank you for volunteering in our research! Juts answer a few questions and the job is yours!! What could go wrong?

name: Exelon
summary: A game for the ZX Spectrum by Hewson

name: ExoCorps
summary: This is Jetpack Powered Exosuit Deathmatch! Prepare for Intense Dogfights with Lasers and Missile Swarms. Hunt your foes across vast landscapes. Avoid detection by managing heat, then let loose with viscous barrages of cannon-fire, railguns, missile rain and more.

name: Exile II: Crystal Souls
summary: You first fought to survive in the pit, and now your party is fighting to keep it. The Empire believes Exile has become too powerful, and is sending troops below to destroy it.

name: Exist
summary: Exist is a survival game that targets your ability to live, grab materials gathered, or stolen to survive in the harsh conditions.

name: Exilio
summary: Discover all the secrets of the island thanks to the revelations that you will live in your dreams, in which you will have to flee from death itself and make decisions that will have consequences when you wake up, and can even cause the death of the people who cohabit with you.

name: Exterminate the world
summary:
The exciting and refreshing VR game is coming. In this game you will play a demon that will destroy the world.
Destroy the houses, the cars, the planes, the tanks, even the zombies!!! You can choose different weapons.
Take out the dark energy of work and life. Of course, you can also do it with bare hands. Come to experience the pleasure of killing and destruction.

name: Experimental Game Pack 01
summary: A collection of games made to promote the Kickstarter project to build the LA Game Space.

name: Ex Oblivione
summary: A 2D action/horror/RPG that includes playable characters such as Nikola Tesla, H.P. Lovecraft.

name: Exactamundo: World Trivia Tour
summary: Exactamundo is a charming trivia game where you travel the world, go on quests and find hidden artefacts. You play as a traveller on an epic journey to discover the whole planet and answer questions about the places you reach. A wonderful way to test how much you know about the world we live in, without travel restrictions. Welcome to Earth!

name: Expeditions: A MudRunner Game - Day One Edition
Exzeal
summary: A sequel that isn’t afraid to be different. Exzeal is the followup to Trizeal Remix, but it’s much more than a simple rehash. Choose between multiple ships and specialize in each one’s weapon system. Will you focus on shooting, shot charging, or close-range attacks? In Exzeal, it’s your choice.

name: Extinction
summary: On the brink of Extinction, fight for your survival and explore the vast galaxies at your disposal.

name: Extraktion 1943
summary: Extraktion 1943 is a roguelite extraction shooter set in Nazi Germany. Survive as a stranded Allied soldier behind enemy lines. Take on the Nazis solo or online with friends, sabotage enemy production, assassinate high-ranking officers, and build your hideout and resistance network. Death to Hitler!

name: Example Block Game
summary:
Example Block Game is an open source implementation of basic block stacking in Lua/LÖVE. Featuring its own standardized kick table, the game has over 7 modes in total to use as reference for implementing your own gamemodes in its extensible engine.

In most modes, gameplay continues until you top out. High scores are saved per mode and can be viewed at any time from the main menu.

name: Extra Lives (Infinite)
summary: See how long you can survive in a world full of brainless zombies and heartless humans! Develop unique relationships with 200 other characters spread across 8 warring factions - each with their own beliefs about what the problem is and how to solve it. Explore over 50 different locations on your journey to restore order to every corner of the city, with hundreds of interactive objects to help you along the way. Featuring an above-average combat system from the Wrestling Revolution series, tearing enemies apart has never been so satisfying!

name: Exastra: Adastra Fan Sequel
summary: What happens after...?

name: Extirpate
summary: Extirpate is an open-world survival where one will face a fight against hungry zombies and relentless survivors. Armed with a range of weapons, from silent handguns to explosives, your skills will be tested as you scavenge for resources. Will you survive or become another victim?

name: Exodus
summary: Exodus is a 2D Platform/Exploration (metroidvania) game for Windows, with oldschool gameplay mechanics, and HD native resolution (1920*1200). Musics are made by Yann Van Der Cruyssen (Saira, Block That Matter).

name: Exit 19
summary:
A forgotten highway exit erodes under the fading desert sun.

Dusk approaches as a car burns away its last drop of fuel.

name: Exfiltraitor
summary: Tactical stealth action

name: Extreme Paintbrawl
summary: Advertised as "The 1st Non-Violent 3D Shooter", Extreme Paintbrawl is the first game in the first-person shooter genre to be based on the sport of paintball. It is cross-promotional with the Sheridan and Crosman brands of gear.

name: Exotic
summary: "Exotic" is a fantasy adventure game. Players need to hunt in the endless wilderness, search for various resources to develop weapons, eliminate mutants, and find a way home.

name: Explosion Magic Firebolt VR
summary: An exhilarating VR action game where you can enjoy exploding magic.

name: Exile: Toki no Hazama he
summary: Exile: Toki no Hazama he is a remake of XZR II which rewrites most of the story, cutting one portion of the final act in which Sadler time travels to the present day (as it referenced the ending to the original XZR), and removes the character of Sufrawaldhi, Sadler's fourth traveling companion.

name: Explore
summary: A game comprised of small platforming-puzzle challenges. Seemingly higher-budget than the other titles.

name: Exposure, a Game of Camouflage
summary: A game of camouflage where you can’t see yourself. Change colors to hide, dodge predators, and survive intense bosses in the abstract wilderness of stealth non-bullet hell. Lose the ability to see where you are, and learn to feel and know where you’re going.

name: Expiri: Tenebris
summary: A ship, an archeget. And the darkness!

name: Exhibition of Speed
summary: Looking for high-speed authentic arcade action? Strap yourself firmly in for this electrifying new racing game. Extensive game features include over twenty world-class racing vehicles including hidden cars, fifteen challenging tracks with varying weather conditions in five different universes, spectacular car jumps with additional boosters on the track, stunning visual SFX on the landscapes and multiplayer gaming for up to four players.

name: Exterminator
summary: A sudden outbreak of anomalies all over the world. It is invisible to others, but you can see it. Only you can solve this situation. Go to the suspected source and listen to the request of the client. It's hard to figure out the location of the monsters, so you have to be strong and go.

name: Extremely OK Painting Restoration Studio
summary: This is an art restoration simulator. It's an extremely OK game.

name: Excavator Simulator VR
summary: Ready for work? Excavator Simulator VR gives a short immersive experience of how to operate a 90 tonne excavator from the comfort of your couch. Drive and dig anywhere or complete the tutorials. It is all up to you.

name: EXS2: EthnologySister2 - Structuralism of Kinship System
summary: EXS2 is a role playing visual novel.

name: Exposed Reality
summary: A Point And Click Adventure Game created by bush_monkey as part of the Reality-On-The-Norm project.

name: Extra Bases
summary: A baseball game from Midway.

name: ExoHarvest
summary: ExoHarvest game pioneers land on Earth Experience a unique survival experience, explore the land, farm, find resources. Trade with partners Fight against unknown creatures.

name: Ex0 Escape
summary: Ex0 Escape is a third-person looter shooter bullet hell. Evade lasers, loot defeated enemies, and grapple your way out of the facility. Build up your Ex0 with modules, become a threat to humanity, and find greater and greater weapons to become an unstoppable force!

name: Excised
summary: You awaken as a fugitive in a dystopian city. Choose your equipment and go! Run for your life as you are hunted down. Find a way to escape this dystopian city, in this action horror game with a innovative stealth system and immersive sim elements.

name: Explode on Contact
summary: Ventur through the levels with a robot character. But be careful, your robot buddy will explode if they hit those spikes.

name: Extreme Riverboat Racing
summary: Extreme Riverboat Racing is an arcade game in which you must reach the goal on time dodging ships, cannons and other dangers.

name: Exteria
summary: Exteria is an old school fantasy first person shooter. Play through the short story and fight for a highscore in survival mode!

name: Exorcist
summary: Remove all traces of evil spelled by supernatural powers in Exorcist, an eerie hidden object encounter. Cursed with the ability to see demons at a young age, Garret Ghostfighter uses his strange gift to help people in need. The well-known exorcist steadily continues his fight for good, until receiving a mysterious letter from someone calling himself Mephisto.

name: Exodus: Black Sun
summary: Exodus: Black Sun is a satirical SciFi RTS that revives the magic of genre classics while innovating on its core conventions. You’ll wage a brutal resource war across a variety of game modes using a host of fresh mechanics that give you unparalleled control over your army’s tactics and play-style.

name: Extrasolar
summary: A sci-fi thriller based on a scientist who is photo documenting extraterrestrial worlds.

name: Extra Inning
summary: The first graphical baseball sim, released by Midway for arcades in 1978

name: Explorer
summary: Horizontal space shooter

name: External Visions
summary:
An artistic metroidvania with a classic NES era gameplay, taking the player through the life of an average man escaping his depression in a partly imaginary world he created around him.
Fight more than 60 enemy types and 5 bosses, uncover more than 160 areas and unlock all powers and items.

name: Expand It! HD
summary: You’ve heard about those huge and terrifying creatures, the dinosaurs… but this isn’t the whole story. Expand it! is a ticket to the more cheerful aspect of the past, revealing a magical world with cute primitive creatures: the Rainbow Dinos! These dinos literally blow up with excitement: touch them and they will instantly inflate. Help them reach the rainbow! Each tap expands them even more; tap again and again, and see their funny bloated faces. To reach the rainbow, you will need to think carefully about which dino to tap and expand first. Only by using the correct strategy can you create a perfect chain reaction of rolling, falling and bursting creatures that will enable them to taste the beautiful colors of the rainbow. The whole tribe will freak out if one of them makes it to the top!

name: Extraction Point: Alien Shootout
summary: Duke Nukem: Critical Mass was to be the first in a new Duke Nukem trilogy for the PSP and the Nintendo DS, but the rest of the trilogy was cancelled. Instead Frontline Studios is still developing the game and it will be released under the name Extraction Point: Alien Shootout.

name: Exit Path
summary: Exit Path is a 2D platformer game. Players control a runner who is met with various obstacles such as sawblades, spikes, and swinging axes in an attempt to escape the obstacle course and become free.

name: Extinction: Skybound Sentinel
summary: Sprint, climb, and soar across the city of Dolorum to reach your opponents, chaining combos together to reach your rivals in the most efficient way possible.

name: Exorcist II
summary: Save the world from everlasting darkness in Exorcist 2, the next terrifying chapter in the saga of Garret Ghostfighter.

name: Exvelten
summary: Exvelten is a Free to play Tutorial of RPG Maker XP + first game of the Gzhapel Series. You are Cytheria or Zachiev; a lone traveler in a home tent. Explore four quadrants of different seasons. Spring Rain, Snow, Desert. Finally a Town to have a little Fun in! Exvelten is a sandbox learning game!

name: Extreme Terror
summary: Demons have once again invaded a UAC military base. Since you seem to be good at stopping such invasions, the UAC has sent you to contain the situation.

name: Exit
summary:
EXIT is a puzzle game that requires pure logic rather than luck or dexterity.
It now includes 100 levels that will blow your mind.

The goal is seemingly simple: put all the balls into their corresponding target slots.
EXIT offers roughly 50+ hours of gameplay for those who'd like to earn 100% achievements.

name: Exostorm
summary: A classic top-down vertical scrolling "shoot-em-up" with amazing music and art.

name: Extreme Bullrider
summary: Extreme Bullrider was a budget PC title published by HeadGames Publishing, and came out right on the heels of Extreme Rodeo.

name: Extreme Cycling
summary: Dive into the excitement of snow-covered cycling adventures! Take on challenging snow-filled tracks, icy trails, and frosty mountains as you race through a winter wonderland.
publishers: Yash Future Tech Solutions Pvt Ltd

name: Exploaris: Vermis story
summary: Exploaris: Vermis story is a metrodvania game where you have to explore a mysterious planet,a group of researchers recently disappeared on the planet, help the main character to solve the secret of this planet, and find researchers.

name: Expiration
summary: In the valley near Kohen City, there’s a small town called Tucker Vale. After receiving strange signals from the mountains, all communications with Tucker Vale vanish. A team of Special Forces has been sent on a mission to check on the village and find out what happened.

name: Extraction: Project Outbreak
summary: A top down military themed shooter.

name: Extract Me
summary: A fully hand-crafted Run N Gun action game. Like Crash Bandicoot but with murder!

name: Exotium: Episode 8
summary: In 2082, the human species lives in peace, and its technological and societal evolutions are exponential.

name: Expedition Agartha: Supporter Pack
summary: You've just uncovered our brand new DLC; The Varangian Guard Armor, Steel Pagoda Armor, and Astradhari Armor sets! Other perks include Increased Stash size, bonus backpacks and starter loot every season. So what are you waiting for? Snatch our Supporter Pack for your next expedition!

name: Explorers: The Game
summary: At last you have found it! A new world, untouched and not yet explored. And there are good reasons for that: The landscape is made up of floating rocks that kept this world hidden for years by their movement. But unfortunately, you are not alone. Other explorers are also trying to travel through this strange world and get rich off its resources. It's up to you to make the best use of the exploration maps and cleverly plan your route to become the greatest explorer of all time! Experience the fascination of this tactical flip & write game. Dive in easily with the tutorial and discover more and more diverse tactical possibilities with each game!

name: Extreme Poker
summary: From standard to original, enjoy several games based on poker rules!

name: Expunge!
summary: Expunge! is a Procedurally generated FPS Arcade. All levels are randomly generated with enemies spawning with one objective, Find and eliminate the Player. Fight through a lair of Golems with Guns and Ammo. Pick up Health when you're hurt and score points for each enemy eliminated.

name: Ex.Emi
summary: Ex.Emi is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. It plays like a traditional fangame where you play as Emi (笑美), a young woman who refuses to leave her apartment.

name: Exomoon
summary: Exomoon (aka Moonblood X) is a megawad for Doom 2. The levels are a somewhat mix of the original Moonblood with some early BTSX levels twist on them, focusing in a mix of the ruins/temple theme with some exotic natural landscapes. Scythe and Mano Laikas also have a strong influence on this. It has been tested on zdoom 2.8 and prboom 2.5.1.3.

name: Explosive Breaker
summary: A vertically scrolling shoot'em up.

name: Exo
summary: Discover alien civilizations, unlocking interdimensional portals to exotic worlds. Follow in the footsteps of a lost race as you decode their language, unlocking the mystery of our origins in the Universe.

name: Exploration: Light
summary: Experience large space ship battles. Uncover the secrets of the mysterious alien race. Upgrade your ship or even start a fleet. Survive

name: EXE Clash
summary: A platform fighting game featuring many spooky video game creepypastas.

name: Extreme Offroad Simulator
summary: Do you feel bored that nothing amazes you anymore? Don't be discouraged!

summary:
You can find the following digital items:

- 5 Exclusive Officer Callsigns
- 1 Exclusive Officer Callsign Frame
- 3 Exclusive Team Banners
