name: Exploding Fist
summary:
Become a master of this mysterious ancient art; progress from novice to Tenth Dan and test your strength and discipline. 18 different manoeuvres including blocks, flying kicks, leg sweeps, roundhouse and even somersaults! Unreleased until leaked in 2012.
It was later released in cartridge by Piko Interactive in 2019.

name: Exterlien
summary:
The plot of Exterlien is very simple: a beauty contest is held in an amusement park. Suddenly, monsters invade the park in an attempt to kidnap the girls. The protagonist, a young man named Masato, decides to venture into the dangerous zone and rescue the beauties.

Exterlien has turn-based battles against monsters, but it cannot be qualified as an RPG due to the extreme simplicity of the combat. The player should simply figure out which attack damages the monster most. There are no experience points, physical exploration, money, equipment, or any other essential RPG elements. The core gameplay is that of a Japanese menu-driven adventure: choose which location to go to, select the best attacks against a monster, be rewarded with erotic (very "softcore") images of the rescued girls.

name: Exodition
summary: You won't survive this game. Let yourself pull into this atmospheric narrative focussed experience .. If you are ready.

name: Explore Inc
summary: Procedurally generated space exploration game.

name: Excidio: The Kaiju Game
summary: Take control of giant Kaiju and destroy everything in your path!

name: Exo-Squad
summary: The player alternatively assumes the roles of three members of the Able Squad: Lt. J.T. Marsh, Sgt. Rita Torres and Wolf Bronsky.

name: Explory Story
summary: Play as a world famous detective who is stuck inside one of his own works! Be careful and watch your step. The words on the page can come to life.

name: Exigent
summary: Decide between bad and worse options as you try to keep an abandoned spacecraft together long enough for a safe enough landing.

name: Explomania
summary:
Explomania is a physically based game with untraditional gaming mechanics.
You place property modifiers within the level to determine property, strength and direction of the action.

name: Experiment
summary: A gameplay clone of Bug Catcher, except that it stars Nature Clan, and it takes place in a science lab. It is the only VT03-exclusive, and likely the final Nature Clan title, ever released.

name: Extreme Paintbrawl 4
summary: The fourth and final entry in the Extreme PaintBrawl series of first-person paintball games is an updated version of the third entry with online multiplayer.

name: eXtinction
summary: eXtinction is a 3D sidescrolling platformer/shooter.

name: Exurgo
summary: Exurgo is a rogue-lite shooter built for roomscale VR. Fight your way up the Spire, an alien space elevator. Find secrets, collect power-ups and defeat bosses. Careful, each death will send you back to the start, but let you upgrade for your next ascent. Can you destroy the Spire and save the world?

name: Extreme Dash
summary:
Get ready for the ultimate challenge.
You have been assigned a simple goal: you have to protect the Cube for 60 seconds.
Looks easy right? It's not.
You will have to push your skills to the maximum in order to pass through these extremely fast roads!
Only 1 out of 25 players beat the game... Give it a try!

name: Exoterrestrial
summary: Exoterrestrial is a set of 5 MBF21-compatible maps that use Tango's Minicharge mod (You DON'T need to download it separately). The maps are mostly easy and pretty different from NoReason's standard fare, with the only exception of the final fight of map05.

name: Exosuit
summary: Exosuit is a dynamic shooter in a unique style, where the focus is on maximizing the fun of gameplay. The game has no plot and the emphasis is only on unbridled action and unusual visual style.

name: Extreme: Rise of the Triad
summary: "Extreme: Rise of the Triad", also known as EROTT, is a highly difficult add-on pack for Rise of the Triad: Dark War. It contains an additional 42 levels designed by Joe Siegler and Tom Hall, and utilizes new tricks and traps.

name: ExoSoul
summary: Exosoul is an adrenaline-fueled top-down shooter that will test your skills and reflexes. Fight for your life against relentless enemies while trying to synchronize your body and soul. You have a powerful arsenal of weapons at your disposal, but you'll need to use them wisely if you want to survive.

name: Exitor
summary: A difficult, fast-paced action, real-time strategy game in which you embark on an exciting journey, fighting against a wide variety of dangerous enemies whilst levelling up your different characters.

name: Exelinya Burst
summary: Hit the enemy with a large explosion! Throw chain explosions, pouring petrol on the treat. Grab a nearby enemy, the game is to throw away a lot of enemies. The game is over when the time limit becomes zero. Please aim for a high score within the time limit.

name: Extraordinary: Immortal
summary: "Extraordinary: Immortal" tells a story of a 700-year time loop. Karena suddenly receives a mysterious letter, in which the sender informs her that there is one thing she must complete on her own, or else all the efforts to save the world from three years ago will become entirely meaningless...

name: Exodus
summary:
Experience the ultimate battle on a photorealistic SF battlefield and witness the emotional ending firsthand!
Utilize the unique characteristics of weapons categorized as Assault, Support, Sniper, and Engineer, Aim your firearms and use more precise controls,
Understand the missions for each game mode and participate in combat to complete special missions.

name: Exo One: Prologue
summary: A strange signal... an alien craft... an interplanetary, gravity-defying journey through space and time. This is the prologue for Exo One.

name: Exiori
summary: Depart on a multi-world adventure to find the legendary relic known as the Exiori to avenge your friend and return home.

name: Extreme Race
summary: In this challenging game you control a car that has no brake and only gains more speed. All you have to do is collect the coins and not crash into the other cars. Collect coins and buy new vehicles.

name: Exatron Quest 2
summary:
Can you defeat the King of Demons?
Game In fr -1 Player

name: Expresso Espresso
summary: Expresso Espresso is a coffee shop management game with a great focus on in-depth coffee creation and market simulation. Roast different coffee beans from across the world, create different drinks from a variety of syrups and styles, manage your team of baristas to create the best coffee drink!

name: Exstetra
summary: A fantasy RPG from the developers of Unchained Blades. It gained publicity for its unusual kissing-based gameplay.

name: Exquisite Corpse
summary: The phrase "exquisite corpse" originates from a surrealist game in which sentences were created by a group of people, each person not knowing what the previous words were. In this WAD, each of the 12 authors was given a block of space 1024x1024 units big and asked to create a part of a larger level. However, all they were given to guide them were small slivers of the previously created pieces adjacent to theirs.

name: Ex Shooter: Triple Bundle Pack
summary: M.A.C.E. Space Shooter - Super Star Blast - Monster Blast

name: Extreme Truck Simulator
summary: Extreme Truck Simulator is a new funny truck game unique through its gameplay. If you thought this truck simulator will be easy, think again!

name: Ex Holics.exe
summary: Delete all enemy players in abandoned cyber space! You have gatling, beam cannon, misslies and more various weapons. SP weapon and mini modules let you more exciting. Survive to bottom layer!

name: Explore Fish Feeding and Grow
summary:
Its all about surviving and growing so, for growing you need to hunt small fishes and other sea creatures.
Explore the Sea World and find out hidden Diamonds.
Help the Little Fish to reach its Destination in its Ocean.

Help your Fish to find out hidden Diamonds and you can help your fish by killing any two fishes or any two sea creatures.
After killing any two fishes, guiding arrow will appears on your screen and it will guide you to the Hidden Diamond.

Fun for all ages
Fun to Play!!!

name: Exiles
summary:
From the creators of the award winning Ravensword: Shadowlands comes EXILES, a beautiful Sci-Fi 3D role playing game that takes place on a distant world.

In the near future, a colony on a distant planet has been driven to isolation and desolation, as a corrupt government tries to enslave it with a lethal virus.

Become one of the Elite Enforcers, and go on various missions that will unravel the secrets behind the plot to enslave the world. Unleash a large arsenal of weapons and items against vicious aliens and mechanized enemies.

Features:
- Explorer a huge and open world, full of alien hives, underground temples, and caves
- A large colony with various interior locales
- Choose from 3 different character classes
- Choose a Male or Female Character
- A large variety of weapons to use and upgrade
- Huge Alien creatures to fight
- Mechs and Hoverbikes available to traverse the massive landscape
- A dark story of government plots and conspiracy
- Real-time Shadows
- Full Night/Day System

name: Exoprimal: Season 2
summary: Season 2 includes a new Survival Pass and runs from October 18th, 2023 to January 17th, 2024.

name: Expert on Domestication
summary: For hundreds of years, the inhabitants and creatures of the continent of Vestria lived in harmony until... In the game, you will play an young man. You can visit towns, enjoy the beautiful history and culture, challenge and collect a variety of animals,uncover secretes. Take your pet and let's go!

name: Exerion II: Zorni
summary: Sequel to "Exerion". Vertical scrolling shooter with 3D effect

name: Exorun
summary: Launched through SM Mobile Communications and mobile game company Putto Entertainment, Exorun is a 3-D game that allows one to play as one of the nine EXO members. Just like the supernatural abilities the members have for their concept, their game characters also have special abilities.

name: Exit the Shadow
summary: 2D souls-like action game with nothing but boss battles

name: Explore
summary: An open world, soulslike action game with authentic battles with chibi characters.

name: Exploration Adventures
summary: Explore the enchanting world! a captivating exploration game that invites you to embark on a tranquil journey through a lush, mysterious lands.

name: Explorers: Deluxe Edition
summary: Explore an archipelago, encounter fellow explorers, and seduce and haggle with them to help you complete your map!

name: Extreme Volleyball Infernal League
summary: Save the world by defeating all your opponents at volleyball! (with special rules) and sending the great demon king back to its world for another millennium!

name: Extreme Motorbike Racing
summary: Extreme Motorbike Racing is a action-oriented racing game with motorcycles. The player is new in the city and wants to become the best racer. It features one playing mode: checkpoint races against the AI. or other players. In these races the player does not only need to reach the end of the course before his opponents but he also has to reach the next checkpoint in a limited amount of time. After he beats a race he unlocks the next course - overall there are twelve set in the same city. The game also features eight different motorbikes.

name: Extreme Gear: Demolition Arena
summary:
Extreme Gear: Demolition Arenas is the new generation of car destruction games. Select a car and go pedal to the metal in completely crazy arenas to crush your opponents and become the master of carnage.

And if you want even more action, challenge your friends via online leaderboards and custom your vehicles to make them invincible!

name: Expedition Oregon
summary: Oregon Industries has tasked with leading the colonization of the last frontier: Space. Fill spaceships with resources then blast them off into the great unknown, seeking fortune while battling calamites that try to defeat you at every turn.

name: Exp10sion
summary: Dive into a whimsical journey with various levels in the cycle of explosions and rebirth. "Exp10sion", a pixel-style 2D platformer born in Ludum Dare 51, will tickle your puzzle-solving fancy!

name: Exploding Babies
summary: Exploding Babies is a quirky arena blaster in a surreal post-apocalyptic setting. Trigger crazed drone babies to explode and take out the competition in a chain reaction. Up to 4 players competitive and co-op with crazy game modes for you and your friends.

name: Exo Pexo Dots & Diamond
summary:
Dots the studious dog and Diamond the playful cat are enjoying some quiet time at home, until they receive a frantic phone call from the Curator at the Museum. The new Egyptian exhibit is due to open tomorrow but the most terrible thing has happened… the mummies have come alive!

Choose to play as Dots or Diamond and solve the mysterious case of the missing mummies by finding the Curator’s lost key and uncovering Scarab Jewels that have disappeared throughout the Museum… all before the exhibitions grand opening.
Discover clues, inspect objects, learn facts and interact with Museum staff to solve the mystery with fun challenges, puzzles and mini games along the way.

name: Exitium - Saviors of Vardonia
summary:
Vardonia is a land in turmoil. Two rival kingdoms are at war, Arkan and Abylon. Wherever your allegiance may lie, all is not as it seems. As various plots unfold they reveal hidden agendas and old, untameable gods, and vicious monsters again run wild. 
 
A grand tale of intrigue, betrayal and redemption; discovery, sacrifice and glory, interlaced with fierce battles and challenging quests. Can YOU save the land of Vardonia?

name: Exoprimal: Zephyr Alpha Fire Dragon Set
summary: Includes five cosmetic items, including the Assault "Zephyr Alpha" suit skin, which cuts through remote enemies with its chakram. The Flame Dragon, a bright red dragon that seems to be covered in flames! Equip yourself with the cosmetic items and unleash a fiery onslaught like a raging fire!

name: Exception;
summary: Exception is a game about AI programming. During the game, the player assists the units to defeat their enemies in the virtual world. However, the player needs to control the units by programming instead of controlling them directly.
developers: Chengdu Lanfei Huyu Technology Co., Ltd.

name: Extinction: Deluxe Edition
summary: Includes main game and a session pass.

name: Exodus
summary: Exodus is a game that blends a god-game and a puzzle game, themed around the "Book of Exodus". As the hand of God, manipulate water, land, and other elements to solve intricate puzzles and lead the Hebrews out of Egypt.

name: Exodus Guilty Vol. 2 Past
summary: The second part of the Interactive DVD edition of Exodus Guilty by Abel Software.

name: Exotium: Episode 11
summary: In 2082, the human species lives in peace, and its technological and societal evolutions are exponential.

name: Exphysia
summary: Exphysia is a new type of action role-playing game that allows players to move freely anywhere in a space where almost everything operates based on physical calculations. Become a slime that can enter anywhere and challenge dungeons and powerful enemies with the sexy otherworldly resident "Lumiers".

name: Exidium Corp
summary:
The Last Frontier is a sandbox MMO with a seamless and persistent world accessible at any time, from anywhere and from any device.
Colonize new lands, build new cities, explore unspoiled nature, form alliances, command armies; drive futuristic and powerful vehicles in a hostile and immense open-world.

name: Exciting Boxing
summary: Exciting Boxing is a Sports game, developed by Human Entertainment and published by Konami, which was released in Japan in 1987.

name: Extreme flight
summary: A game of flying in a hole.You must avoid all obstacles and get as high a score as possible.This game has no end.Map is randomly generated.The control is reality.

name: Excessive Trim
summary: Wreak havoc through backwater farmlands as an alien with a buzzsaw flying saucer!

name: Exist.EXE
summary: Play as a game developer trapped in a digital world, hacking the environment to find a way out in his journey of self-discovery.

name: Exa Innova
summary: I believe this is Compile's first vertically scrolling shooting game, and contains many elements they'd later incorporate into the Zanac / Aleste series. The title screen credits "Programmers-3" but I have seen re-releases crediting Compile. Plus, the sprite for the enemy that splits into two halves is exactly the same as the one in Zanac!

name: Exclusion
summary: One day, the protagonist happens to be on a train that has a train accident. The accident, which made national headlines, set off a chain of tragedies for those who were also present. Who is the victim and who is the perpetrator?

name: Extreme Typer
summary:
Strike your keyboard to attack the monsters!
Challenge your typing speed!
Rarely seen, Extreme Typer is a typing game bringing you joy while increasing your typing speed!
You wanna type English faster?
Playing Extreme Typer is the way to go!
There are quests to conquer and stage bosses to slay
Monsters won’t be standing around. They will test your concentration and visual
skills by various movements.
Each boss has a different super power to make the typing more challenging.
Each time after you play, your speed and accuracy will display.
You will know exactly how far you’ve gone.
Before you know it, you’ll be typing at super speed!

name: Exoprimal: Nimbus Fancy Banshee Set
summary:
This pack contains five cosmetic items, including a skin for the Support suit Nimbus.
A Fancy Banshee wearing a hard coral exterior! Equip these cosmetic items as you flit around healing your allies like a fairy!

name: Existence = !Existence;
summary: 2066 year. The planet was overwhelmed by unemployment, poverty and crisis, humanity is getting closer to lifting the limit on life expectancy, but the situation on the planet has caused stratification among the population. You are a member of a hacker group that fights for the rights of mankind.

name: Explore the Backrooms
summary: A backrooms game full of story puzzles, monsters and places to explore.

name: Extreme Offroad Racing
summary: Extreme Offroad Racing is a FREE all-terrain, off-road monster truck racing game featuring hundreds of race challenges. Get behind the wheel and buckle up for the most addictive and FUN physics-based driving experience!

name: Extreme Skyway Racer Simulator
summary: Get ready for a thrilling 3D gaming experience that will push your skills to the edge! Extreme Skyway Racer Simulator puts you in the driver's seat as you navigate precarious platforms suspended in the sky. Your mission: to race across these dizzying heights while maintaining your balance and avoiding a nerve-wracking plunge.

name: Extra Terrestrial Perception
summary: Walking outside one night, bright lights appear overhead. You wake aboard an alien ship. Use your resourcefulness, along with newfound psychic powers to overcome the enemies and obstacles that stand in the way of escape.

name: Executioner Girls: Legacy Pack
summary: It is a DLC with all the existing DLC rewards integrated. Includes 20 exclusive costumes, special colleagues and special item.

name: Exorcist 2: Crow Magic
summary: Are you ready to witness the adventure of the Exorcist, a master of magic and exorcism, and exorcise the most powerful dark being, the crow demon?

name: Exzisus
summary:
Exzisus was produced by Taito in 1987.

Taito released 403 different machines in our database under this trade name, starting in 1967.

Other machines made by Taito during the time period Exzisus was produced include Arkanoid - Revenge Of Doh, Double Dragon, Dr. Toppel Tankentai, Flying Shark, Hishou Same, Great Gurianos, Inspiration Baseball, Tokio, Storming Party, and Soldier Of Light.

name: Extreme Makeover: Home Edition
summary:
Good morning family! Ty has arrived in this new match 3 game and he is ready to do some renovation! Are you ready to help him with the home design and the total makeover of the house?
Play exciting match 3 levels and blast your way through the game! Use boosters, bombs, drones, rockets and dynamite to smash the elements or combine them into amazing power-ups! With every game and level you play you will win coins and other currencies that will help you with the renovation and the design of the family’s house!
Demolish the house and build a new one from the ground up, design the exterior, and decorate every room of the house. Plant trees, paint the wall, tile the floor, place furniture, add special decorations and much more! Every family has unique traits and unique rooms to explore and to design and that means there is always something new and exciting coming your way with each family you unlock!
The Features of Extreme Makeover: Home Edition
Exciting and rewarding match 3 action! Every level you pass and every challenge you overcome gets you one step closer to the absolute dream house and rewards you with coins and boosters!
Build the dream house for the family! Use your home design skills to decorate all the types of rooms, from living rooms, kitchens and bedrooms to gardens, garages, playrooms and home!
Tons of amazing items and styles! Help Ty to pick the perfect furniture and decorations for the rooms and give a unique style to the house. Modern or traditional, industrial or casual, every family has its own style and theme!
Another family, another story! Every family has its story. Build a professional office for the remotely working programmer or give the chef of the family a new kitchen to experiment. Create a dino-room or a space-room for the kids and park the car in the new brand garage.
Ty’s Secret Project: Extreme Makeover: Home Edition comes with a few surprises and Ty has always something up his sleeve! Progress the story and live the surprise of new and impressive gifts along with the family!
Join Ty and the rest of the crew of Extreme Makeover: Home Edition in this fantastic match 3 game! Grab your sledgehammer, get your safety helmet on and get ready for some house demolition! Let the design begin and let’s move that bus!

name: Expect No Mercy
summary:
The Virtual Arts Fighting Academy is the latest way of teaching deadly martial arts. Students are put through ruthless training using the most advanced Virtual Reality gear. They train and light in virtual worlds with Virtual Reality opponents yet the pain is real. The academy is also a cover for a deadly group of mercenary assassins willing to kill for a price. You are an undercover agent tor the covert government agency known as the Federal Security Bureau. Your mission is to destroy the Virtual Arts Fighting Academy and bring down its leader.

But the mission is not as simple as it seems. Expect the most brutal lights ever seen, virtual masters, intoxicating virtual reality worlds and the most explosive visual effects ever seen in a fighting game.

Microforum is proud to present the most realistic, fast action, lighting game ever! Real actors, state-of-the-art animation and graphics. ruthless martial arts fights. intelligent enemies, exciting play levels bizarre cast of virtual opponents, explosive special effects, deadly battles and traps. woven into a suspenseful story line based on the fealure film “EXPECT NO MERCY."

name: Extreme Demolition
summary: One of the first demolition derby game on mobile with real damage simulation. Special attention was given to make a perfectly balanced driving model which is realistic but also fun. On the other hand, Your goal is really simple. Just destroy your enemies!

name: Explody Bomb
summary: In EXPLODY BOMB you must play the role of aggressor and defender. On the television screen you must shoot down all enemies that attempt to attack you!

name: Exodus Vigil
summary: Explore the Dark and Dangerous Temples and Tombs of Ancient Egypt in this story-driven 3D puzzle game. Follow the familiar story of the Israelite Exodus from the Egyptian perspective.

name: Exit84
summary: "The King has finally found it! What he was looking for all these years! Rejoice! The only problem is: its on the dangerous planet B-84! Your duty is to retrieve it for him, no matter the cost! Type your way into the dangerous asteroid, avoiding lasers and bullets with the help of your trusty coordinate reader. One second could make the difference between death or EXIT."

name: Extraordinary: Soul
summary: "Extraordinary: Soul" is a hand-drawn wind suspense story puzzle game, the story takes place in a shamanic legend of the town of Mutuso, you will follow a naughty robot Moe to investigate an unusual disappearance case.

name: Exit Terminal
summary: Could you Exit Terminal?

name: Extreme Velocity 3
summary: Drag racing game.

name: Experiment
summary: You don't know where you are but you know you need to get out of there.

name: Exit VR
summary:
Exit VR is a game about SCP-087 staircase, located on the territory of the research institute. 
At this time, it is not known whether SCP-087 ends anywhere. 
Exit VR. There is no way out.

name: Exadimension Neptunia
summary:
Ever watched the ending video of a Hyperdimension Neptunia game and wanted to play that 2D-style RPG? Now you can in this fan game!

Slay monsters, make video game references and break the fourth wall all in 2D Graphics! Two years after the events of Megadimension Neptunia VII, take control of your favorite characters from the world of Gamindustri as they face a new threat: the personification of present day video game industry problems!

name: Extermination Cars Stadium
summary: Extermination Cars Stadium presents a new type of racing - competition game where only one can emerge victorious.

name: Exciting Baseball
summary:
A baseball simulator, Exciting Baseball follows Exciting Billiards and Exciting Basket (better known as Double Dribble in the West) in Konami's series of sports games for the Famicom Disk System.

Like the others in the Exciting series it's a straightforward exemplar of its particular sport. It doesn't have the flair of the original two Exciting games, as it never had an Arcade antecedent.

name: Exoprimal: Deadeye QB-W Set
summary: This set includes five cosmetic items for the Assault-type exosuit Deadeye -- known for its ability to skillfully slay dinosaurs from a distance with its rifle. Daily training is imperative for survival! Equip these cosmetic items and lead your team to victory!

name: Existential Dread
summary: Existential Dread was a warmup project, to get back into making doom maps and vanilla in particular.

name: Exocraft
summary: Design unique spaceships and build the ultimate space mining fleet as you team up to battle for resources and glory in this massively multiplayer action strategy set in an alien wasteland.

name: Experience: Colorblindness
summary: Have you ever wondered how colorblind people see the world? Now you can experience it yourself. Let yourself be guided in narrative mode, explore 3 immersive environments, try fruit shopping or painting. Color vision tests also included.

name: Exile III: Ruined World
summary: Your own party of exiles return in the final chapter of the Exile trilogy by Spiderweb Software. You're sent to the surface world to make peace with the empire. Shortly after reaching the surface you find the world is troubled by slimes, giants, and troglodytes, to name a few.

name: Exit From: Director's Cut
summary: You wake up from the noise of thunderstorms, no one there. You are trying to get out and realize that after all you are not alone here... Сan You Exit From?

name: Exposure
summary:
Survive in an evolving environment by morphing between light & dark forms to camouflage from your predators.

But be careful: you won’t be able to see yourself either. Lose the ability to see where you are, and learn to feel & know where you’re going.

name: Expeditions: Viking - Blood-Ice
summary: Jarl Ragnhildr sent this sword after your father's funeral with her compliments for the way you handled Erlingr's sons. Runes delicatedly engraved along its narrow crossguard spell it's name, Blóðíss.

name: Exit Doors
summary: You play a series of Escape rooms and try to find a missing red stapler to get a date. Solve puzzles and mysteries in a classic point-n-click adventure.

name: Exogen VR Experience
summary: Lift off into the cosmos in this stunning immersive 3D VR music video taking you on a futuristic journey into space with mesmerizing visuals of evolving sacred geometric patterns and a sense of weightlessness as you fly through the stars, all choreographed to original electronic music.

name: Exodus Guilty Vol. 1 Present
summary: The first part of the Interactive DVD edition of Exodus Guilty by Abel Software.

name: Extrorb
summary: A fast-paced, third-person, ball mayhem game.

name: Excalibur 2555 A.D.
summary: Taking cues from already established hits such as Tomb Raider, Excalibur 2555 A.D. takes place from a third-person perspective which allows for a better flow of gameplay. As you advance through the mythical world of ancient England, you encounter various types of items and weapons, all of which will aid you in your quest for Excalibur.

name: Exoprimal: Murasame Shuten-Doji Set
summary:
This pack contains five cosmetic items, including a skin for the Tank suit Murasame.
Shuten-Doji, carrying demons on both shoulders! Equip these cosmetic items and slay your enemies like a demon god!

name: Express Raider
summary: Express Raider was produced by Data East in 1986.

name: Exit Station 7
summary: You entered a train station and appear to be stuck in a loop. Multiple levels to test your observation skill. See if you have what it takes to escape the loop!

name: Extreme Power
summary: Fast polygon shooter making the full potential of the PlayStation. Stage effects and fully lighted polygon graphics unlike you ever seen before!

name: Extreme Real Reality HD Remix
summary: ERRHDR is a heartfelt journey all gamers can relate to.

name: Executive Command
summary: Do you have what it takes to be the President of the United States of America?

name: Excitebike: Bun-bun Mario Battle - Stadium 3
summary:
The third episode (stadium) of Excitebike: Bun-bun Mario Battle.

Excitebike: Bun Bun Mario Battle is a remake/adaptation of the NES title, Excitebike. In this game, all human motorcyclists were replaced with Mario characters. As a Satellaview title, Nintendo developed the video game and released four versions of it through the satellite download service operated by St.GIGA, each expanding on or replacing the features of the last.
Audio broadcasting of the game is both advice on the game and voice drama told by characters. Voice actors are the same as that of "BS Super Mario USA", but Excitebike adds a new character, Wario (Chikao Ootsuka).

name: Extravaganza Rising
summary:
Fortune favors those bold enough to collect and train tiny monsters.

Three brave souls boldly descend into a town ridden with monsters, allies and everything in between. Driven only by the promise of powerful trinkets, unlimited treasure and almost certain death, they venture on.

name: Explosion
summary: An indie puzzle game based on satisfying explosions and an exciting story. Use your wits to solve levels with varying TNTs and progress through the fun and exciting story of Amber, you, and the Corporation!

name: Excavator Simulator
summary: WANTED: Excavator driver! Who doesn't dream of swapping a shovel and spade for a big excavator? Even as children, we all played with excavators and trucks in the neighbourhood playgrounds. Enough dreaming! Now you take on the role of an excavator driver, eat, sleep, dig, repeat!

name: Extra Story of God's One Day World
summary: Extra Story

name: Exorcizamuste
summary: Exorcizamuste is an Action, Horror, Survival, Puzzle Solving and Investigation game for single or multiplayer with its online cooperative mode.

name: E.x.p.l.o.r.: A New World
summary: Quests, exploration, and strategic turn-based combat await a party of adventurers in this modernized "Love Letter" to the classic dungeon crawler RPGs of the 80s and 90s.

name: Extreme Hunting
summary: A 3D hunting game where players use pump-action rifles to shoot on-screen animals including deer, moose, elk and bears. The game has three selectable weapons: rifle, shotgun and power bow.

name: Exceed Gear
summary: A 2D rogue-lite anime action game, focused on combos and freedom of expression. Build synergistic combos through mind-blowing modifiers and combat upgrades each run. Fight through hordes of Valkyries and become the savior of the E.X.C.E.E.D program!

name: Exit Mask
summary: Inspired by obsessive thought patterns and the compulsions that come with them, Exit Mask is an experimental art game where your biggest threat is yourself. Depicted in grainy black-and-white, this project details the experience of being plagued with ceaseless intrusive thoughts and the struggle to coexist with the uglier side within.

name: Extreme Pamplona
summary:
Run away from the bulls or people who are chasing you! How long can you survive? This game was made for Sure Men Deodorant!
You need to keep running and avoid any obstacle along the way. Timing your jump carefully and don't get caught by whoever is chasing you. Clear every stage around the world and have fun!

name: Excive
summary: Sometimes the robots set on a riot. Then you start turning them into the ground metal. That is just your job.

name: Exact
summary: Ricochet your way to victory as you light up the screen with enchanting colors. Score EXACTLY what’s needed by bouncing off the coloured “Scoring objects”. Avoid obstacles, activate triggers and manipulate your speed in this physics puzzler!

name: Explosive Madness
summary: Explosive Madness is an exciting game about physics and destruction. You have to destroy various structures using tools and explosives! In the game you will find many exciting and exciting levels of varying difficulty.

name: Extreme Snowboard
summary:
Ride your snowboard at high speed down the slopes of the best ski resorts in Europe and America. Set the fastest times solo, or against a friend/family in the super fun multiplayer mode.

You will be able to perform numerous tricks with the help of obstacles on the slope. Each trick you perform will give you time bonuses that will improve your final time.

name: Exsys
summary: Exsys is a Castlevania style, rough-like, beat em up game that takes you into the rich world of The System. Fight enemies, steal and use their body part as a weapon or equip as a new body part. As you explore the world and try to escape.

name: Exadimension Neptunia 2: A Chao Returns
summary:
Ever watched the ending video of a Hyperdimension Neptunia game and wanted to play that 2D-style RPG? Now you can in this fan game!
Slay monsters, make video game references and break the fourth wall all in 2D Graphics! Two years after the events of Exadimension Neptunia , take control of your 3 character as they face a new threat: the personification of present day video game industry problems!

name: Exit/Corners
summary: Exit/Corners is an episodic adventure featuring visual novel story segments and riddle-based puzzles. Five strangers find themselves trapped in an abandoned hotel that’s set to collapse in 24 hours. To escape alive, they'll have to solve their captor’s riddles and unravel the mystery behind their abduction.

name: Explosive Racing
summary: In the beginning, you start off with only two tracks, six vehicles, and the Practice and Championship modes. By successfully clearing the game modes in specific ways, you can unlock more tracks, vehicles and additional game modes. There's also a two player mode which can be accessed using the PlayStation Link Cable.

name: Exisled
summary: Exisled is an XNA community game available over Xbox Live Marketplace. It is a top down shooter.

name: Exa soldier Space shooter
summary:
Exa Solider is an arcade/platform/shooter/rpg space adventure game inspired by beautiful classic games. 
Explore, exterminate alien enemies and get new armors to increase your power. 
 
You lost the contact with your base and crashed on a hostile planet. Your mission is to retrieve your power to come back home. 
 
Explore the planet, destroy the hostile creatures, discover new places and complete the missions. 
 
Exa Soldier has a lot of level and is not a typical linear game, Exa Soldier is a beautiful Adventure. 
 
Features: 
 
- Platform shooter game 
- Huge bosses 
- Rpg adventure 
- Lot of levels 
- 3D to 2D graphic 
- Non linear game 
- Different type of missions 
- Upgrade your armor to survive 
- Electornic music 
 
Try it, it's FREE.

name: Exit: Left or Right
summary: You can go left or right, but remember, a mistake will cost you your life…

name: Ex Vitro
summary: Ex Vitro is a dark sci-fi 2D platformer where you delve into the ruins of a military research facility and discover the horrors within. Whether machine, creature, or something else entirely, you’ll face the violent legacy of the last survivors of humanity.

name: Exodus: The Rise of Chaos
summary: You wake up trapped in your own mind, a mental prison filled with fears and distorted memories. To survive and understand the true nature of a Global Apocalypse, you must first confront the inner demons that haunt you.

name: Expiate
summary:
Expiate follows the dreams of Corbin, who accesses his subconscious by dozing off to the static sound and visuals of his television screen. It gets predictably surreal from there. You can choose to lead him to the darkest pits of his mind... or just break a bunch of stuff with a metal baseball bat. Either way, something or someone's gonna get beaten up.

Expiate is a mostly traditional Yume Nikki fangame, with some slight alterations to the formula. Effects are a part of the game, but collecting them is not your main focus. Instead, use effects and explore to look for strange objects located around the dreamworld. Gather these items in order to progress.

name: Exotic Matter
summary: Exotic Matter is a game about exploration, crafting and fighting. You wake in the wreck of your crashed space ship on a far away planet. If you'll ever make it back to Earth depends entirely on you. Explore a unique planet and use your ingenuity to craft what you need to fight your way back home!

name: Extra Ordinary
summary: Short retro-inspired game based on Extra Ordinary (2019) a supernatural horror-comedy film directed by Mike Ahern & Enda Loughman. You play as Rose, a (mostly sweet and mostly lonely) Irish small-town driving instructor, who must use her supernatural talents to save the daughter of Martin (also mostly sweet & lonely) from a washed-up rock star who plans to use her in a Satanic pact to reignite his fame.

name: Exit the Backrooms
summary: Embark on a journey through 8 meticulously crafted levels that blur the line between the mundane and the surreal. Each environment, designed to captivate the senses, pushes the boundaries of what you thought you knew.

name: Exoprimal: Vigilant Alpha Insurgent Set
summary: This pack contains five cosmetic items, including a skin for the Assault suit Vigilant α, which delivers precision blows from a distance. Insurgent, a combat uniform that suits a heavy rifle! Equipped with these cosmetic items, blend in with the battlefield and go after your prey!

name: Exoprimal: Krieger Alpha Tin Machine Set
summary: This pack includes five cosmetic items, including a suit skin for the Tank suit Krieger α, which uses a chargeable shotgun with wide-range scatter shot and compressed fire options. Tin Machine robots transcend generations and are loved by all! Equip these cosmetic items and develop a sturdy defense!

name: Exoprimal: Witchdoctor Mega Man Set
summary: This pack contains five cosmetic items, including a suit skin which makes your exosuit take on the appearance of Air Man, with his signature torso propellor. Equip these cosmetic items and dash to the aid of your teammates!

name: Exoprimal: Murasame Alpha Gladiator Set
summary: This pack includes five cosmetic items, including a suit skin for the tank Murasame α, which comes with a freezing counterattack. A gladiator in solid armor! Equip these cosmetic items, and scatter your enemies with a swing of your fighting spirit!

name: Exile's Journey
summary:
Exile’s Journey is a dark fantasy RPG.

An exile by choice, Kniryk is now presumed dead in Landoria, his homeland. When a demon invasion threatens the Kingdom of Nysoroth, he finds himself in the midst of it. Can he redeem himself?

This game is a love letter to role-playing games as a whole, especially those from the 16-bit era.

Features:

Highly engrossing storyline - You'll be hooked playing as these characters, learning about their diverse backgrounds, and watching as they develop and solve their own personal conflicts.

Open ended gameplay - After an introductory section, you're allowed to complete the game's dungeons in any order you want!

Zelda-style dungeons - Each dungeon in Exile's Journey is meticulously crafted and designed, taking inspiration from dungeons in the Legend of Zelda series.

Numerous side quests - These side quests are optional, but without them you won't receive the game's best armor and equipment, or the game's only method of air travel! These side quests feature story lines of their own and offer a break from the game's main story.

20+ hours of gameplay - That sweet spot between too short and too long!

Extremely detailed world - This game takes doesn't allow you to travel the whole world, only the large and extremely detailed Kingdom of Nysoroth. After playing and learning of the country's cultures and history you'll feel like a true Nysorothian!

Weapon upgrade system - Some weapons will almost never become obsolete thanks to this!

No random encounters - see enemies on the map before engaging them!

Treasure tracking - The game keeps track of all the treasure you've found in the main dungeons! Find all treasure chests to obtain a special reward!

Three act structure - The game is divided into three acts, each thematically and structurally different.

For fans of Final Fantasy, Zelda and Dark Souls.

Operating system supported: Windows

name: Extreme Stream Power
summary: In future space everywhere is full of danger, the alien invasion, the betrayal of artificial intelligence, chemical and biological weapons cause, you then joined the practice qigong and martial arts school, the students practise every day to improve their own ability,

name: Extreme Riding
summary: Extreme Riding is an racing game where your task is to test your skills in driving different cars on exciting tracks. Choose your car and go to the track! Go through unusual obstacles, jump over cliffs, maneuver, and get to the finish line in a certain time.

name: Explosive Pursuit
summary: Explosive Pursuit - a game where you have to avoid obstacles and police officers who want to catch you!

name: Explosive Fighter Patton
summary: A tank arena combat game, known for its aggressive instructions which stated, "TURN TO SIDE B AND INSERT TO ******* BOX!"

name: Extremal Doom
summary: Extremal Doom is a Doom megawad by Russian level designer Mikle Ilyin that was initially released in January 2003. It features three episodes, as well as some texture and sprite replacements, several of which have been taken from Hexen.

name: Exotic Cars VI
summary: The protagonist of Exotic Cars VI, has in the game what is called the hero’s journey, it is a path of revenge and redemption. The protagonist has a mentor to help him, along his journey he has to lose everything he has and all his loved ones in order to complete his journey and rise again.

name: Expert Rifleman - Reloaded
summary: Expert Rifleman is the first 3D ballistics simulator available to the general consumer. It includes a full featured ballistics calculator allowing the simulation of any type of ammunition.

name: Explorers of the Abyss
summary: After Princess Olivia's father falls ill, it's now up to her to explore the labyrinth known as "the Abyss" and seek a way to restore order to the kingdom.

name: Exodus H
summary: Exodus H is a simulation game in space. You play as the commander of a colonial spaceship. You must build the spaceship in order to survive your inhabitant and navigate into space to find a new planet where Man can live in.

name: Expedition Amazon
summary: Expedition Amazon follows four team members on an expedition to navigate the ruins of the Incan civilization.

name: Expeditions: A MudRunner Game - Pioneer Pack
summary: Challenge yourself in the wild with 4 unique variants of trucks.

name: Expeditions: A MudRunner Game - Year 1 Pass
summary: Uncover the mysteries of an ancient civilization and start exploring a subterranean world with the Year 1 Pass. Gain access to exciting exclusive content through 4 major DLC releases throughout the year, along with instant access to the Cotco Canyon truck.

name: Extrapower Giant Fist
summary: Third game in the EXTRAPOWER series by doujin group Lucky Lamp. A strange wind blows across the savannas of Africa, driving the animals into a frenzy, so Zophy and his friends set out on the trail of a mysterious bracelet of uncertain origins and the competing factions that seek to exploit its power. Additional characters are unlocked that add additional perspective to the plot and their own play styles.

name: Exil
summary: A Mystical Anime-Inspired Metroidvania. Embark on an adventure through a mystical world full of magical creatures.

name: Exoprimal: Skywave Monster Hunter Set
summary: This pack contains five cosmetic items, including a suit skin based on an armour set made from parts of the electrifying Phantom Beast of legend, Kirin!

name: Extrapower Attack of Darkforce
summary: Following the conquest of the Shakun Star, galactic conqueror Dark Force sets his sights on the planet Earth. Sharkungo flees to warn the humans before the arrival of the invasion force, thus beginning a journey across the planet to collect allies from across the Extrapower series to protect the Earth and bring an end to Dark Force's ambitions. Over 20 heroes are playable across 53 episodes a strategy RPG styled after tokusatsu, anime and manga.

name: Excitebike-e
summary: Excitebike-e is an e-Reader game released in 2002. The game is a port of the Nintendo Entertainment System video game Excitebike and was part of the first batch of classic NES ports for the e-Reader. The player could play the game by scanning five cards, each one with two barcodes excluding the fifth one, which only had one.

name: Expeditions: A MudRunner Game - Supreme Edition
summary: Embark on scientific expeditions with this new off-road adventure from the creators of MudRunner and SnowRunner. Lead research missions as you drive a variety of all-terrain vehicles, using high-tech tools and managing your camp and crew to ensure your success in the wild.

name: Exodus: Journey to the Promised Land
summary:
Exodus: Journey to the Promised Land is an unlicensed NES game made by Wisdom Tree in 1991.
According to the game's instruction manual, the player controls the biblical figure Moses as he leads the Israelites to the promised land. Moses has the ability to shoot glowing "W's", which signify the word of God, to defeat enemies and remove obstacles. To finish each level, Moses must acquire five question marks as well as a certain amount of manna while avoiding enemies such as magicians and soldiers. After a level is completed, the player must answer five bible-related questions before advancing to the next level. Exodus, like many Wisdom Tree games, is a rehashed version of a Color Dreams game, in this case Crystal Mines.

name: Exit Kun: Play Together
summary: Experience the fun of Kunkun with your friends! You can play online through local or Steam remote play.

name: Exotium: Episode 7
summary: In this episode, Mr Harris will discover how the man with the headset is not just a little kid and that he has a far greater influence than he would have thought.

name: Expedia Cenote Experience
summary: Explore the Cenote in Expedia Labs VR. The experience takes you into the caves of similar cenotes that are found in the Yucatan Peninsula. Although a simulation of the true experience, you can learn facts and where you could find real cenotes if you wish to travel in the future. Step into the water to watch the fish swim around you or stand on rocks as the waterfall gently splashes your face.

name: Extreme Paintbrawl 2
summary: The sequel to extreme Paintbrawl. Paintbrawl 2 is published and developed by Headgames and Hoplite unlike Paintbrawl which was created by Creative Carnage.

name: .ExE
summary: .ExE is an English Yume Nikki fangame. It stars Carrie, a girl who refused to leave her apartment. .ExE involves entering a dream world through the protagonist's computer, with Carrie clicking on an application. Carrie takes on a different form in the dream world. The main objective is exploration and collecting effects.

name: ExoColony: Planet Survival
summary: Space-colony simulation game where you have to survive on an unknown planet with your wrecked spaceship. Start a new civilization and terraform the planet. Expand your colony, mine resources, refine them and build a thriving place to survive.

name: Extreme Burger Defense
summary: A tower defense game created in under ten hours. You're a scientist who has crafted the most delicious burger in the universe, which also happens to attract every bear in the universe. Including cyborg bears.

name: EXVS2
summary: The Final Mod Compile for the classic game Ultimate Knight Windom XP.

name: Explore Jam 3
summary: Pack of non combat maps. Some puzzles, some platforming and a lot of exploration! In comparison with 2 previous Explore jam packs this one is leaning toward walking simulators with a lot of environmental storytelling.

name: Exiledge
summary: The universe trembles, the soil shatters. A young man called Alter embarks on the adventure to uncover the destiny of the world built by Zora. In Exiledge, experience a unique combat system on the base of third-person shooter with hack and slash. Fight along with the mysterious girl, Zora, and experience colorful battles and epic boss fights. Search for the truth of the universe and the opportunity to save the world in an eternal cycle.

name: Exoprimal: Zephyr Street Fighter Set
summary: This pack contains five cosmetic items, including an exosuit skin that makes your exosuit take on the appearance of Guile, the U.S. Air Force soldier who fights for peace in his homeland. Equip this skin and slice through the air with a Somersault Kick!

name: Extracurricular Activities
summary: Extracurricular Activities is a visual novel following the main character (you!) through his endeavor of trying to romance a member of his tennis team. The choices you make can impact the way your teammates react to you, so make your choices carefully.

name: Exoprimal: Krieger Mega Man Set
summary: This pack contains five cosmetic items, including a suit skin which makes your exosuit take on the appearance of the Yellow Devil classic enemy. Equip these cosmetic items and conquer the battlefield like a Yellow Devil!

name: Exoprimal: Barrage Splash! Set
summary: This set includes five cosmetic items for the Assault-type exosuit Barrage -- known for lighting the battlefield ablaze with grenades. Make a splash in the heat of battle with this cool cosmetic set as you engulf your enemies in flames!

name: Exorcise
summary: Exorcise is the first title of ( The Hell + Me ) game series. In this game you In an underground place occupied by demons you must try to survive and find your way by solving puzzles and destroying the demons. Are you ready for an exorcism?

name: Extermination 1
summary: Find the most efficient way to reduce the infected population in casual rogue-lite game Extermination 1. Adapt. Overcome. There are no limits stopping you from snowballing in this reverse bullet hell.

name: Exoprimal: Skywave Fire Guardian Set
summary:
This pack contains five cosmetic items, including a skin for the Support suit Skywave.
Fire Guardian, a golem wreathed in flames! Equip these cosmetic items as you fly around the battlefield and lead your team to victory!

name: Exoprimal: Vigilant Street Fighter Set
summary:
This pack contains five cosmetic items, including an exosuit skin that makes your exosuit take on the appearance of Chun-Li, the former ICPO agent who fights with spectacular legwork.
Equip this skin and show off your high-kicking skills!

name: Extopia
summary: 20XX. The world as you know it is gone. In its place spawned the land known as "Oasis", a so-called paradise in a world filled with chaos. Three major factions control the Oasis through manipulation of trade, military might, and tentative alliances.

name: Extreme Climbing
summary: In extreme climbing, there are various well-known tower shaped buildings that are impossible or even prohibited to climb in reality, to challenge the natural reaction of fear of heights and fully enjoy the fun of climbing. Welcome everyone to experience "Extreme Climbing"!

name: Exorcist Onmyoji
summary: This is a light puzzle game where you play as Onmyoji characters "Yang" and "Yue" to exorcise spirits from a mansion. Enjoy immersive, eerie puzzles without any fear!

name: Exterminate
summary: On a far away planet the forces of evil are attacking human kind. Battle your way through a huge cave and destroy the egg made by the Devil himself.

name: Extreme Trucks Simulator
summary:
Do you like to Do you like heavy trucks? Try the latest simulator where you can feel what’s like to take control of Extreme Vehicles such as Construction Excavators, Dumper Trucks, Bulldozers, Haulers, Cranes, Garbage Trucks and many more! 
 
Extreme Trucks Simulator features many scenarios: country roads, quarry mine, deserts, mountains, cities etc… 
 
Easy and intuitive controls will let you experience and feel these extreme trucks! 
 
More than 8 modes with a total of 80 different levels waiting for you. Show off your skills, prove that you’re the best! Play Extreme Trucks Simulator!

name: Exotium: Episode 5
summary: In this episode, Mr. Harris is going to face these deepest demons and confess a truth he had never revealed until now.

name: Exit 2
summary: Exit 2 is the sequel to the PlayStation Portable game Exit. The developers promised more focus on puzzles rather than action and platforming. It was released in Japan and Korea in 2006 and in Europe and Australia in 2007.

name: ExAltered
summary: Unofficial card simulator for Altered TCG

name: Exo Racing
summary: Exo Racing is for everyone who wanted to take part in illegal racing but been scared of legal consequences and risk of getting hurt.

name: Exector
summary: ''Spin Drift, the outer space probe caught by mysterious energy And She lose all control of herself Spin Drift is being pulled into unknown planet. The mysterious energy is came from a supernatural ruin on the planet. Under the present circumstance, Spin Drift will rush into the atmosphere too hardly enough to burn herself out. Time limit is only 10 hours! Scramble, Exector! Scramble, Exector! save our ship, Spin Drift.''

name: Express Courier Pro: Urban Bike Delivery Simulator 2024!
summary: Embrace the challenge, fuel your ambition, and become the ultimate master of the rush as you dominate the streets!

name: Extant: Zombie Eradication Co-op Simulation
summary: The apocalypse was years ago. Those still living are termed the 'Extant'. The dead can smell the living from a mile away. Because of this, Extant SOG groups of four operators have been tasked with infiltrating areas with supplies alone to retrieve for the Extant civilians. You are one of them.

name: Expert Puzzles & Mazes
summary: A collection of three puzzle games: the solitaire board game Satori: Expert Edition, the jigsaw-like Expert Picture Puzzle, and the randomly-generated 3D-Maze: Expert Edition.

name: Exoprimal: Roadblock Tragic Monster Set
summary: This set includes five cosmetic items for the Tank-type exosuit Roadblock -- known for protecting allies with its massive shield. Transform into a horrifying monster and unleash your wrath on enemies and opponents alike! Equip these cosmetic items and command everyone's attention!

name: Exhausted Man and Candleman Bundle
summary: Two heroes of the ordinary.

name: Exotica: Petshop Simulator
summary: Exotica is a simulation game where you run an exotic pet shop in the city.

name: Exit 2
summary: EXIT 2 Is an short horror game in which you have to collect items without getting cought by the creatures.

name: Exotic Fighter
summary: Action fighter game.

name: Exotium: Episode 3
summary: In this episode, Mr. Harris will learn more about the past and the motivations of the man with the headset, but will always remain suspicious of him.

name: Exit Veil
summary:
In Exit Veil, players are cast in the role of Tori, a lost soul navigating her way through a beautiful and terrible world on the brink of decay.
Collect tarot cards and use them in tense MMO healer class-inspired turn-based battles, where you are always moments away from oblivion. Forever on the back foot you’ll have to test your resolve to snatch victory from the jaws of certain defeat.

name: Excite Mahjong
summary: A Mahjong game for the Casio PV-1000

name: ExoMiner
summary: Ever dreamed of conquering planets? Leaving your mark on human history? Rivaling the Medici, Rockefeller, and Bezos? Making unbelievable money and ADVANCING the world? Discovering and creating life changing technologies? Then, strap in, because you are headed to the STARS.

name: Executive Assault 2
summary: The RTS/FPS phenomenon has moved into space! Build and command fleets of starships for epic space battles, pilot fighters, mine and trade resources, assemble robots to defend or assault other stations. Take sole command or share the glory as you fight for control of the quadrant.

name: Exposure Office Simulator
summary: Exposed Office Simulator is an office touching game. By touching the breasts and other parts of the body, the game makes you feel as if you are touching them, as you become animated by touching them.

name: Exocraft.io
summary: Design unique exocraft and build your fleet of drones to battle and mine for resources in this massively multiplayer action strategy set in an alien wasteland.

name: ExtremeJobs Knight's Assistant
summary: Effortless control! An unusual tension! A warrior out on an adventure needs a capable manager! B-humor, quick growth, lots and lots of collectibles, tons of items and equipment crafting! It's everything that you you'd want in a stand-alone idle game.

name: Exit Fate
summary: Exit Fate is a freeware RPG inspired by Suikoden and Chrono Cross. The story centers on Daniel Vinyard, a colonel within the Kirgard Army as the kingdom prepares for war against it's neighbour, the State Union of Zelmony. Caught in a whirlwind of political intrigue, recruit seventy-five potential party members as you explore a continent at war.

name: ExMortalis
summary: Awaken in a Victorian tower, face biotech horrors. ExMORTALIS: a stealth horror FPS, inspired by System Shock and Prey. Explore, survive, fight, hide. Choose implants for power or outmaneuver foes. Uncover the truth behind Necrotechs' experiments.

name: Exteel
summary: Exteel is a (Now cancelled) free-to-play online game centering on mech-on-mech combat between players.

name: ExE
summary: There was a big fire at a hospital which inflicted serious damage. Touya's mother, Suzuno, fell victim to its flames. After ten years he still can't overcome his sadness. But he somehow enjoys his life with Makina, his younger sister, and Saya. One day he sees a girl who looks quite like Suzuno. He can't forget her, and goes after her. He finally talks to her and thinks she is definitely Suzuno. All of a sudden, she attacks him with smile, and he almost loses his life. But a girl with a sword appears in front of them and saves him. He doesn't know what's going on, but he thinks, "Is she still alive?" He starts to search for the truth...

name: EXR
summary:
Row your way, train with friends and join the world's biggest 3D rowing community.

Discover your passion for indoor rowing with EXR: row in virtual worlds, join events and race rowers from all over the world. Channel your inner rowing champion and grow stronger with every workout!

name: Exoprimal: Exoprimal Survival Pass Season 3 - Premium Tier
summary: These special rewards let you get more out of the wargame!

name: External-Dimension: Mainframe
summary: Blaze through the world of Mainframe in this fast paced Action-Platformer inspired by the Megaman Zero Series. You play as Frame, a Data Scanner who is tasked with combating the destruction of the world. Use a variety of movement options and weapons to overcome challenges to rid the world of +ERRoR.

name: Extra Case: My Girlfriend's Secrets
summary: Your girlfriend seems to be hiding something. Will you respect her privacy or pry into her secrets? Don't worry, though. This is a horror dating sim with a time loop, so you can try again...and again...and again...

name: Exhibition of Speed
summary: Build your own car and go racing.

name: Exoprimal: Witchdoctor UFO Set
summary: This set includes five cosmetic items for the Support-type exosuit Witchdoctor -- known for delivering shocking blows to enemies and repairing squadmates. Equip these cosmetic items and leap around the battlefield as a UFO. You'll be sure to stand out!

name: Extreme-G
summary: Extreme-G is a futuristic racing game with an emphasis on speed. It also features many weapons and an F-Zero style energy shield and regeneration.

name: ExTime: Primal Menace
summary: ExTime: Primal Menace is an action-adventure horror game inspired by iconic franchises such as Dino Crisis and Resident Evil. Travel to the archipelago in the Bermuda Triangle and find out what brought the monsters of the Cretaceous period back to our world.

name: Excalibur
summary: Excalibur is 2D arcade side scrolling shoot'em up game. The game hasn't real story and has quite a simple game play - the player controls a red space ship, flies straightforward, avoid obstacles and shoot enemies in various locations (mostly mountains with space background). The enemies are in many types, shapes and colours - spaceships, "molecules", geometric figures, etc. If a spaceship flies too slowly, then it has a tendency to fall down.

name: Exponential Idle
summary:
Exponential Idle is a math-inspired incremental game available on Android and iOS.

Your goal is to stack up money by taking advantage of exponential growth. To do so, you have to step through time by tapping the equation or simply let the time follow its course. You can perform change of variables to accelerate the process, buy upgrades, get rewards, and unlock achievements while earning virtual money.

name: Exoprimal: Deadeye Alpha Deinonychus Body Set
summary: Includes 5 cosmetic items, including the Assault "Deadeye Alpha" suit skin, which uses two different types of projectiles to destroy your enemies. A Deinonychus Body that lets you be just like a real dinosaur! Equip yourself with cosmetic items and bring out your wild instincts to fight!

name: Exotic Traffic Racer: FastLane
summary:
Exotic Traffic Racer pits your driving skills in an endless highway as you dodge and drive past incoming cars in both the left and right lanes.
We've simplified the controls to only two options. Touch the left of your screen to drive left and touch the right of your screen to drive right.
Challenge and compete with your friends and conquer the leaderboards.
Purchase and collect various cars for sale using in-game money.

name: Exhausted Man
summary: A slow-paced action game with simple control, funny physics, and exhausted life experience.

name: Excavation Alliance: Cadoramo
summary: A tough side-scrolling action roguelike game. In underground caves where various "animal" factions vie for resources, danger, treasures, and intrigue abound! To be a cave explorer, confronting numerous enemies with daggers, guns, great swords, or attack with magic wands!

name: Exoprimal: Roadblock Monster Hunter Set
summary: This pack contains five cosmetic items, including a suit skin which makes your exosuit take on the appearance of the ultra-aggressive Rajang, letting you become destruction incarnate!

name: Exits
summary: A Japanese collection of escape room puzzles for mobile

name: Extreme 500
summary:
Extreme 500 (also known as Suzuki Alstare Challenge in France and Grand Prix 500ccm in Germany) is a motorcycle racing simulation done with the assistance from the 1997, 250cc World Championship winning team (as advertised).

The game consists of all 3 GP classes (125, 250 and 500), racing on the World GP tracks of 1996, and it's possible to race against the clock, the computer or up to 15 other players in the multiplayer network version.

Extreme 500 incorporates several elements of motorbikes you can tweak as you please, so you have to try and fine-tune your bike to be able to get the best time.

name: Extreme Bike Racing
summary: Extreme Bike Racing is ultimate 3D Bike Racing game for all age group. There are 3 stages with 3 challenges in every stage in which player has to face different hurdles and difficulties to complete that challenge.

name: Exoprimal: Barrage Monster Hunter Set
summary: This pack contains five cosmetic items, including a suit skin based on an armour set made from parts of the terrifying Elder Dragon, Nergigante!

name: Exoprimal: Barrage Alpha Mystic Set
summary: Includes 5 cosmetic items, including a suit skin for the assault "Barrage Alpha", which destroys enemies by bombing them with rocket launchers. Mystic, which wears an eerie atmosphere! Equipped with cosmetic items, blow away both enemies and evil spirits with a powerful blast!

name: Explorers of Esmar
summary: Explorers of Esmar is a game about building your settlement and establishing complex production chains.

name: Exiled Survivors
summary: Dive into the heart-pounding world of Exiled Survivors! Experience relentless action, shape your destiny through strategic choices, and face monstrous foes. Unlock up to 30 characters, conquer bosses, and revel in the perfect blend of Vampire Survivors' intensity and Diablo's depth!

name: Extreme Rally Raid
summary: Extreme Rally Raid is a 3D PC game, close to rally raid races experiences. Extreme races, long and strong stages, in natural environments with a lower human intervention.

name: Exerizer
summary:
The game is a vertical shoot 'em up in the style of Galaga and Phoenix, but with eight-way movement across the screen and parallax scrolling for the stars backgrounds. At the player's disposal to fight the approaching enemies, some of them made in pseudo-depth 2.5D graphics with scaled sprites, is a small space fighter capable of firing two types of projectiles: the unlimited but slow rockets and the fast laser shots that are limited by draining the ship's power. The power can be refilled, and the ship itself upgraded, through collecting the power-ups that appear after destroying certain enemies. 
 
The game can be played by up to two players in alternating turns. Similar as in Gorf, it features several different types of waves (stages). For instance, one stage features space witches saddle-perched on either serpentlike Chinese dragons or Western-style winged dragons: the dragons must to be hit repeatedly in the weak point of their heads to be killed, after which the riders themselves can be shot for a score bonus. The player progresses through most of them by either destroying all the enemies (resulting in the score bonus and power-up awards) or alternatively just surviving their attacks for a long enough time. 
 
The game was mostly well received by Western game critics, albeit some criticized it for its depiction of women.

name: EXA: The Infinite Instrument
summary: Step into EXA, an immersive musical studio where you can compose, record, and perform music using expressive instruments of your own design. Jam with EXA’s huge sound library or your own, create virtual bands, invent 'impossible' playing styles, export to WAV/MIDI, and so much more.

name: Exodus
summary: In an alternate version of Earth where the Soviet Government won the race to the moon, you've crash-landed in one of the most inhospitable environments known to man. Will you be able to survive on the Moon with only what’s around you?

name: Exile: Wicked Phenomenon
summary: The Age of Chaos is upon the Chaltar world! The source of this chaos is rumored to be at the heart of an ancient tower. Join Sadler, Rumi, Kindi, and Fakhyle as they begin a new quest: To learn the secret of the ancient tower and stop the madness spreading over the land. Choose from five different characters as you hack, slash, and bash your way through foreign lands, putrid pyramids, and deadly dungeons while enjoying intense cinema sequences along the way. Will Sadler be able to unlock the secret of the ancient tower and stop the insanity that is spreading throughout the land? Only you can decide that as you guide Sadler through this heart-stopping Action/RPG!

name: Exotium: Episode 4
summary: In this episode, Mr. Harris will discover that certain technologies are much more advanced than he thought and that the field of possibilities is much greater than he imagined.

name: Exos Heroes
summary: A mobile RPG gacha game developed by Oozoo, published by LINE Games.

name: Extinction Facility
summary: Extinction Facility is an immersive VR horror fan game that brings a fresh and terrifying twist to the Gorilla Tag-inspired genre. Set in a dark, sprawling facility, the game draws heavily from chilling inspirations like "Big Scary" and "Scary Baboon," creating an atmosphere filled with tension, suspense, and unexpected frights.

name: Extreme Highway Racing: Real Speed Driver
summary: Maximum drive at maximum speed on extreme tracks!

name: Exploración: Casa Barroso
summary: Join me on this little exploration of the Barroso family's house.

name: Extreme Race
summary: Don't lose control of your car

name: Ex-Argent: Menes no Sairyuu
summary: A short RPG.

name: Extreme
summary: Extreme is a fast-paced action game for the ZX Spectrum that pits players against alien pirates across three diverse environments. Players navigate through space, underwater, and a building interior, each section offering unique gameplay mechanics and challenges. Despite its modest origins as a spare-time project, the game boasts impressive graphics and special effects for its platform. The compact adventure can be completed in about 20 minutes, delivering an intense, varied experience that showcases the Spectrum's capabilities.

name: Excave III: Tower of Destiny
summary: A Japanese-style dungeon crawler where you play as the heroine Scarlett.

name: Expeditions: A MudRunner Game - Year 1 Edition
summary: Embark on scientific expeditions with this new off-road adventure from the creators of MudRunner and SnowRunner. Lead research missions as you drive a variety of all-terrain vehicles, using high-tech tools and managing your camp and crew to ensure your success in the wild.

name: Exercise Your Demons!
summary: Unleash your inner beast and battle back hordes of demons and beads of sweat. With the finest fitness trainers from the Infernal Gymnasium guiding your every move, you’ll throw down in your living room to save the world from an untimely demonic demise.

name: Explosionade DX
summary: All your friends are storming the Horronym Fortress but Colonel Bouche left you to guard the supply depot. Disregarding orders you open the depot to find a gigantic, prototype mech. Time to Suit Up!

name: Exed Exes
summary:
On a planet 6000 light-years from earth, there were creatures called Exes, which resemble large insects, that were used for industrial purposes. However, these creatures one day took to revolting against their creators. Two battle machines have been sent to fight against the Exes, known as Colonel and Sargent. The Exes are nearing completion of their secret weapon, Exed Exes, and they must be defeated before this is allowed to happen!

Exed Exes is a basic vertical scrolling shooter; the game scrolls forward, and the player can maneuver their ship around the screen to shoot enemies and avoid attack. POW icons sometimes appear that can power up the ship or turn enemies into fruit that are worth extra points. The game can be played either solo or two-player cooperatively.

name: Extra Lives
summary: See how long you can survive in a world full of brainless zombies and heartless humans! Find your place among hundreds of other characters spread across several warring factions, and battle to reclaim every corner of a sprawling city in real-time.

name: Experimentation
summary: A linear visual novel about five short stories, unrelated at first glance. Be prepared for mysticism, gloomy atmosphere and light psychological horror. Not recommended to play if you are experiencing depression or severe psychological state.
